name: Ahamkara Scale
flavor: "And that Warlock thought I couldn't do it. Hah!"

name: Ankh of Sai Mota
flavor: //…a rattling shriek, the crunch of bones and the fading echoes of a brave woman's last laugh…//

name: Blood-Soaked Charm
flavor: To carry this charm is to fight for the lost world that fashioned it.

name: Butterfly Code
flavor: "Sensitive dependence between microfunctions," reads the inscription. Cryptarchs disagree on whether its origins are from the Vex or Golden Age Mars.

name: Coyote's Luck
flavor: A relic of the legendary Six Coyotes, the first Hunters to scout the Cosmodrome.

name: Dredgen Yor's Rose
flavor: "In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright."

name: Efrideet's Eye
flavor: Every time she pulled the trigger, an enemy of the City died.

name: Filament Hex
flavor: A Hive totem woven and bound from filaments of the universe itself.

name: Fist of Eight Moons
flavor: Only in the Ascendant Plane—where a well-defended idea is a reality—do these moons, in this small way, still exist.

name: Hezen Totem
flavor: Can a machine change its ways? Any more or less than a human can?

name: Jasper Carcanet
flavor: I WAS MIDHA, CONSORT OF STARS. I WILL NOT BE FORGOTTEN.

name: Neural Bezoar
flavor: "Don't eat that!" "…Too late."

name: Pallas Ring
flavor: The Queen of the Reef commissioned these rings for each of the survivors of the Siege of Pallas.

name: Parasitic Optic
flavor: "Listen, I don't know how it works—I just know that it works, okay? No, I'm not worried."

name: Prismatic Heart
flavor: "You must learn to tease apart the hues of your own heart." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Rainbow Blade
flavor: The beauty of this sacrificial weapon belies the deadliness of its infinitesimally sharp edge.

name: The Maraid
flavor: The chronicle of Queen Mara Sov of the Awoken, compiled by the Primarchs of the Reef Cryptarchy.

name: The Pahanin Errata
flavor: The collected sayings, quips and observations by the legendary Hunter Pahanin.

name: Thrallskin Drum
flavor: A drum made from the skin of a Hive Thrall. Even when no one is playing it, you can always hear a faint beat.

name: Thrice-Wrapped Thing
flavor: Sure, try and unwrap it. I mean, what could possibly go wrong?

name: Trinary Star
flavor: "We were fools to trust this god-machine, this bringer of death and Darkness."

name: Two-Sided Coin
flavor: A Hunter doesn't leave anything to chance.

name: Unerring Compass
flavor: Its needle always points toward the Traveler.

name: Wax-Sealed Case
flavor: Definitely not made of wax. Probably actually a case, though.

name: Asharru's Hope
flavor: "I know not why we left the Reef, nor why we live so long, nor even why we are called Awoken. But I hope one day to have answers." —Asharru

name: Claw of Command
flavor: On the might of your hand does your authority depend.

name: Cyclopean Enigma
flavor: "More eyes, more problems. That's what I always say."

name: Echo of Honor
flavor: "For he was once of your City, and honored there." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Firebreak Eternal
flavor: A piece of the Fire Victorious, the ever-burning flame of the Titan Firebreak order.

name: Fortuna Pendant
flavor: A necklace made out of the remains of the asteroid destroyed during the Reef Wars.

name: Horn of Six Wars
flavor: How many have died with the blast of this horn ringing in their ears?

name: Iglatho-Cyu
flavor: Drink, if you dare.

name: Incubation Shell
flavor: Cryptarchs still have no idea where Vex come from, or how they came to be.

name: Intact Warmind Core
flavor: Codename: MARTEL. Parent: !REDACTED!. Status: ILIODOR COMPLETE.

name: Judgment of Mars
flavor: Cryptarchs say this orb is our first clue toward the identity of the Cabal commander leading the siege of Mars.

name: Kabr's Pocket Watch
flavor: The tick-tock of this strange watch sometimes feels like a heartbeat.

name: Radegast's Blade
flavor: So long as this sword was whole, the Iron Banner could not be broken.

name: Saint-14's Ring
flavor: Was there ever another Guardian so beloved by the people?" —Paean to Saint-14

name: Scales of Eao
flavor: WE STAND UPON OUR OWN UNENDING DEATHS.

name: Scroll of Eimin-Tin
flavor: You hold in your hands the last record of a long-dead civilization.

name: Skyburners' Obol
flavor: A coin suspected to be part of a Cabal funerary rite.

name: Sootpearl
flavor: These oddly beautiful orbs can sometimes be found sunk into the rot and filth of the Dreadnaught.

name: Stoneborn Relic
flavor: A piece of the City's first Wall, carved into the shape of the sigil of the Titan Stoneborn order.

name: Sunscorched Lens
flavor: "We have mastered the art of shaping and tempering physical Light."

name: Vell Tarlowe's Vigil
flavor: His Light is gone, but his memory remains.

name: Wei Ning's Cong
flavor: This ancient jade artifact has been in the Hive's possession ever since Wei Ning's heroic death.

name: Wings of Apris-Fol
flavor: "To you goes the glory and the honor of battle." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Yzoz's Pendulum
flavor: "First test of the mechanism codenamed Yzoz's Pendulum was...not ideal." —RECORD 360-CHASM-2334

name: Broken Crown
flavor: Eliksni songs still tell of Chelchis, Kell of Stone, who stood before the Maw.

name: Flamel Crest
flavor: Anything can be anything else, if only you will it so.

name: Hourless Glass
flavor: The sand in this seemingly ancient timepiece will not move, no matter which way you turn it.

name: Leaf of the Bleeding Tree
flavor: Eat not of the fruit of this tree.

name: Light of Moths
flavor: In the Hive's ontoformic reality, this glow is the manifestation of bound, dying souls.

name: Numinous Web
flavor: A web spun from the flayed and frozen Light of Guardians lost.

name: Oddly Colored Cube
flavor: Gallida died to bring these cubes back from Venus and I still don't know why." —Despoina Kore

name: Ring of Living Stone
flavor: "In memory of the Deep Stone Crypt, the tower where we were born."

name: Segoth's Head
flavor: "Thought we formed the Banner to fight the Darkness, not ourselves. Just don't bode well, s'all I'm sayin'." —Gheleon

name: Silent Oracle
flavor: "Sometimes I swear I could hear it speaking, but I can never remember. I think it spoke of a name."

name: Sins of Kharad-Tan
flavor: For you are not the first hero—nor even Oryx the first villain—to meet upon this plane.

name: Sisyphus Project
flavor: "Clovis refuses to back down. Meanwhile, the others have taken to calling it 'the Sisyphus Project'…" — laboratory notes found at a Clovis Bray facility

name: Skorri's Dirge
flavor: They say she's apart from the Iron Banner, yet she sings songs of her lost companions.

name: Specimen Twelve
flavor: Running hot with the effort of simulating not one group of scientists, but two hundred and twenty-seven.

name: Spectral Dust
flavor: A sample of the mysterious particulate that protects and hides the Reef from invaders.

name: Techeun Bangle
flavor: An approximation of the glittering augments worn by the Queen of the Awoken's advisors.

name: Thanatonaut's Lullaby
flavor: Makes the passage just that much easier.

name: The Damned Lute
flavor: "Hey nonny nonny, hey nonny nonny, be not blithe nor bonny..."

name: The Traitor's Die
flavor: Every roll of this die is already written into the fabric of Oryx's reality.

name: Tome of Nothing
flavor: The few who have claimed to see words on its seemingly blank pages have subsequently gone mad.

name: Transcendent Eye
flavor: "You are not the seer. Not yet. You are the one who is seen." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Warp Fragment
flavor: This piece of Golden Age technology is covered in particulate originating from beyond our solar system.

name: Weregilt
flavor: Even among the Hive, all death has its cost.

name: Whispering Sphere
flavor: You can't be sure, but you think you've seen Lord Shaxx speaking into a sphere just like this one.

name: Abyss Defiant
flavor: We will not go quietly.

name: ALR96-40 Overkill
flavor: Enough is never enough.

name: An Answering Chord
flavor: Let no challenge lie. Let no question hang. Let no music fade.

name: Anguish of Drystan
flavor: "Hard to starboard! Stand by, weapons. Helm, get us out of here!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

name: Antipodal Hindsight
flavor: Nope. Still don't see it.

name: AR760 Truth Serum
flavor: Lie to me, please.

name: Arminius-D
flavor: Unleash a torrent on your enemies with the Häkke Arminius-D.

name: Atheon's Epilogue
flavor: "Atheon's story is still being written. The wielder holds the pen." - Unknown

name: Black SUROS ADM-94
flavor: A rapid-action Suros firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Black SUROS PPG-96
flavor: A high-velocity Suros firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Bronzed Miyamoto-D
flavor: An aggressive Häkke auto rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Carte Blanche S.1
flavor: An accurized Vanguard-issue auto rifle, designed for performance at long range.

name: Cassiopeia
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the queen of the night sky.

name: Clean Sweep XI
flavor: For housekeeping.

name: Cydonia-AR2
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. The AR2 is a general-purpose weapon with a robust blowback action.

name: Cydonia-AR3
flavor: The City can't rely on a steady supply of programmable matter, so the multirole AR3 uses it only sparingly.

name: Deep Fix T76
flavor: The word 'multirole' is kind of a misnomer. The role is shooting. Gun's just flexible about the how of it.

name: Dispatch I11
flavor: Sends help with every squeeze.

name: Do Gooder V
flavor: Hey! Hey! I can help!

name: Doctor Nope
flavor: First, do no* harm. *For values of 'no' approaching 'vast and permanent'

name: Doctrine of Passing
flavor: Death is the best teacher.

name: Doctrine of Passing (Adept)
flavor: Death is the best teacher.

name: Does Not Bow
flavor: A Kell cut off his arms. He built himself new ones. Then he killed the Kell with them.

name: Eclypse V/MX2
flavor: If it's worth shooting once, it's worth shooting - how many times was that?

name: Eidolon Ally
flavor: We thought it was inanimate but it has grown...changed. Ghost refuses to analyze it further but I secretly believe it has become my friend.

name: Fabian Strategy
flavor: Wait for enemy to make a mistake. Die. Stand by for Ghost Resurrection. Repeat as necessary.

name: First Rule DHYB
flavor: Patience is a virtue. Bullets are better.

name: For the People
flavor: I stand against the state of nature.

name: Forcing Function
flavor: Psychologically tuned to reinforce an important skill: holding down the trigger.

name: Frontier-AR1
flavor: Clear skies. Tall grass. Open space. Perfect shot.

name: Galahad-B
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. Precision-fire variant with a harmonic dampening system for accuracy at range.

name: Galahad-E
flavor: This extraordinary multirole rifle boasts a smartmatter frame, the key to remarkable capabilities.

name: Grim Citizen III
flavor: The grief and horror of Twilight Gap drove some of the finest gunsmiths in the City to elevate their art.

name: Haakon's Hatchet
flavor: An auto-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Use against Fallen targets to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Hard Light
flavor: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

name: Harrowed Anguish of Drystan
flavor: "Hard to starboard! Stand by, weapons. Helm, get us out of here!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

name: Her Memory
flavor: All things are done in her name.

name: Her Right Hand
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Her Right Hand
flavor: The Royal Guard's weapon of choice.

name: Her Vengeance
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Hex Caster ARC
flavor: The engine of devastation slumbers within - waiting for a worthy finger on the trigger.

name: Husk of the Pit
flavor: Dessicated and nigh-inoperable this Hive artifact still manages to send shivers up your spine when fired.

name: Izdubar-D
flavor: Millennia will pass, and your name will still ring out.

name: Khvostov 7G-02
flavor: An ancient weapon, battered and worn - but it still fires true. Perhaps it's been waiting for you.

name: Longspée-A
flavor: When all around you is chaos, the dependable Häkke Longespée-A won't fail you.

name: Low Down P-XIV
flavor: "It's competition. It's the Crucible way." —Lord Shaxx

name: Marshal-A
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. Tuned for accurate fire at good range - useful when engaging masses of Fallen.

name: Marshal-A0
flavor: This auto rifle is a reliable fallback when other weapons can't be found.

name: Marshal-A1
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. Tuned for accurate fire at good range - useful when engaging masses of Fallen.

name: Monte Carlo
flavor: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

name: Morass-AR4
flavor: Flooded fields. Rustling reeds. Sodden shelter. Mark your targets.

name: Necrochasm
flavor: Eternity is very close. Can you feel yourself slipping?

name: Painted SUROS CGB-47
flavor: A precise Suros auto rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Paleocontact JPK-43
flavor: An auto rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Pest Control Matrix
flavor: No infestation. Guaranteed.

name: Primed SUROS JJJ-76
flavor: A fine-tuned Suros firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Problem 78F
flavor: Cabal military codes allegedly refer to 'death by multiple gunshots' as 'Problem 78, Subsection F'.

name: Quagmire-AR1
flavor: Soggy conditions. Low visibility. Accuracy? Perfect.

name: Questing Beast
flavor: You'll never catch it. But that's not the point.

name: Red Spectre
flavor: Rumor has it that Red Death prototypes are circulating in the Crucible once again.

name: Righteous VII
flavor: Executor-issued auto rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Rising Tide AR0
flavor: Can't stop the inevitable.

name: Ros Neve IV
flavor: Bright as the sea, old as the ocean, fierce as the storm.

name: Sahara-AR2
flavor: Full-auto instrument of war. The Sahara is a rapid-fire weapon built to throw a storm of lead.

name: Sahara-AR3
flavor: The Sahara-AR3 is a storm weapon, built to hail bullets. The action self-corrects to prevent jams.

name: Sahara-AR5
flavor: This extraordinary multirole rifle boasts a smartmatter frame, the key to remarkable capabilities.

name: Shadow Price
flavor: A precision auto rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

name: Shingen-C
flavor: The Shingen-C is a precision rifle for seasoned Guardians. The barrel floats in smart gel, insulating it from shock.

name: Shingen-E
flavor: The exemplary Shingen-E is built to pop skulls.

name: Silimar's Wrath
flavor: An auto rifle forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Silvered Hushwind-D
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke auto rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Soulstealer's Claw
flavor: The claws dig deep. The pain is unrelenting.

name: Steppe-AR3
flavor: Arid air. Sharp horizon. Nowhere to hide. Make it count.

name: SUROS ADM-50
flavor: A good weapon to have at your side in a pinch, or when just killing time.

name: SUROS ARI-41
flavor: Balance. Flexibility. Style. SUROS.

name: SUROS ARI-45
flavor: Precision. Power. Style. SUROS.

name: SUROS ARN-33
flavor: Rapid fire. Superior design. SUROS.

name: SUROS ARN-39
flavor: Uncanny precision. Forgives user errors. SUROS.

name: SUROS PRR-11
flavor: The Suros PRR-11 is a balanced, flexible and dependable weapon.

name: SUROS Regime
flavor: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

name: SUROS TSA-10
flavor: Suros prototype. Make precision kills to gather data for the Suros research department.

name: SUROS TYR-14
flavor: Stable. Dependable. Rapid-fire. SUROS.

name: SUROS WER-45
flavor: Precision. Modulation. Superiority. SUROS.

name: Surrender A
flavor: The advice is meant for them, not you.

name: The Dealbreaker
flavor: Not gonna happen.

name: The Summoner
flavor: Join the dance of fire and birth.

name: The Summoner (Adept)
flavor: An elite trophy earned only by Trials of Osiris champions.

name: Unwilling Soul-09
flavor: An auto rifle modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Up For Anything
flavor: Risk is its own reward.

name: Vindicator XI
flavor: Executor-issued auto-fire weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Wolfslayer's Claw
flavor: Its claws are sharp, many and unrelenting.

name: Wolfslayer's Claw II
flavor: Its claws are sharp, many and unrelenting.

name: Zarinaea-D
flavor: You provide the will, and the Häkke Zarinaea-D provides the way.

name: Zhalo Supercell
flavor: An upcycled torrent of righteous thunder.

name: "After Effects"
flavor: "Nothing that happens in the Crucible is irreversible…except the lessons you learn."

name: "Ancestral Demise"
flavor: Humanity's rich and tattered history provides fuel for libraries of debate on Light, the Traveler, and all creation.

name: "Blind Evoke"
flavor: "Learning without application is like drinking without thirst." - from Aphorisms To Anger Warlocks, a Hunter handbook

name: "Blood Maturity"
flavor: "I have found that rarest treasure: a pragmatic Warlock." - Saint-14

name: "Born of Sight"
flavor: "Reality is the most ruthless analyst." - Praxic saying

name: "Circle of War"
flavor: "Understanding is not an end, but a beginning from which new truths are born."

name: "Computable Secrets"
flavor: Exo Warlocks take particular interest in the physics of Light, seeing analogy to their own origins.

name: "Controversial Remains"
flavor: Like all Guardians, Warlocks are vessels for the Traveler's Light. But that power must be mastered.

name: "Cosmic Truths"
flavor: "To bind Light into the same framework as the proton or the mere neutrino is an act of close-minded hubris."

name: "Creation's Wind"
flavor: "The Light releases us from causality. It smooths the contours of what we can and cannot do."

name: "Cryptic and Ineffable"
flavor: "You did not receive the bond so you could babble arcane words. Go forth, and burn our enemy."

name: "Curse of the Hidden"
flavor: "I vowed to avenge them all, and this curse I will carry to my final death." - Eriana-3

name: "Death of Fate"
flavor: "Our fate is not sealed. With the proper will, and enough force, it can be rewritten."

name: "Dispersed Vengeance"
flavor: "I made quite a reputation in the Crucible. Spent some time trying to outrun it." - Ikora Rey

name: "Dread's Enmity"
flavor: "They've stolen our worlds. In return, would you not send their ether to the winds? I would. I have."

name: "Emerald Light"
flavor: "They'll believe you are one of their own. And that is the only way." - Toland, the Shattered

name: "Eternal Light"
flavor: "You stand for something immutable and transcendent. Act like it." - reprimand to a younger Ikora Rey

name: "Existential Threats"
flavor: Furious debate divides those that seek knowledge in order to aid the City, and those who seek knowledge for its own sake.

name: "Expansion"
flavor: Always consider the connection between your field work and vaster things.

name: "Eye of History"
flavor: Those orders most closely allied with the Titans seek to hone the battlefield deployment of Light.

name: "Faceless Demise"
flavor: A true leader speaks with the voice of the people.

name: "Forgotten Force"
flavor: Every exercise of your power adds a syllable to the greater song.

name: "House of Devils"
flavor: "What shall we call thee?"

name: "House of Kings"
flavor: "Have they not learned the fate of Earth's kings?"

name: "House of Wolves"
flavor: "Beware of false prophets."

name: "Immanent War"
flavor: "The next war is already here, waged in the theater of the inmost."

name: "Inertia Engine"
flavor: "I believe that the Traveler and its Light are advanced technology. I refuse to accept that this diminishes me."

name: "Light Beyond"
flavor: "Every light that marks the abyss offers hope against the rising tide."

name: "Light Unknown"
flavor: The bond is signified and signifier, source and focus. Do not seek closure. Let the mystery unfold you.

name: "Loop of Night"
flavor: "I could flense you apart, molecule by squirming molecule. It is within my power." - Toland the Shattered

name: "Metastability Event"
flavor: The great energies of the Golden Age never triggered a false vacuum decay. We'll be fine.

name: "Mirrors of Chaos"
flavor: If the City falls, there will be no one left to adjudicate phenomenological debates. So now, even the scholars fight.

name: "Mystic Drain"
flavor: At the desperate battle of Twilight Gap, Warlocks worked in concert to shatter the enemy. It was not quite enough.

name: "No Footprints"
flavor: "Gravity? Oh, that nuisance. I never bother with it." —Lyssa, the Lighthearted

name: "No Tomorrow"
flavor: "For every dead yesterday there waits a new dawn, with no promise of tomorrow."

name: "One True Constant"
flavor: Some orders eschew all metaphysics and ontological doctrine in favor of pure combat discipline.

name: "Other Side of Nothing"
flavor: "Nobody comes back the same."- The Parables of Osiris

name: "Paradox and Truth"
flavor: "The Light remade us. Can I still claim to be human? Can you still say you were made by human hands?"

name: "Phantom Wisdom"
flavor: "What is Light? Who made it? How does it work? Light itself answers these questions. Do you understand?"

name: "Praxic Thunder"
flavor: With knowledge, purpose. Each sharpens and hones the other.

name: "Praxic Vim"
flavor: Praxic Warlocks don't hate research. They just don't let it interfere with the fight.

name: "Red Eternal"
flavor: Death is the fate of all life. We only shorten the way.

name: "Ritual Expansion"
flavor: "Beyond Sol's gravity, beyond Earth's pull." —Arach Jalaal

name: "Song of Dusk"
flavor: "I'll be the last Light they ever see." - Eriana-3

name: "Song of the Light"
flavor: At the edge of the singularity, light freezes, unable to face the mystery. But you must go on.

name: "The Age to Come"
flavor: "There is strength in unity. And a King of many, will be the King of all."

name: "The Before Time"
flavor: "Do you remember who you were?"

name: "The Calming"
flavor: "I have devised a technique to liberate the soul from the flesh. It works very reliably on Fallen."

name: "The Chaos Constant"
flavor: "Darkness consumes, but, we shall mark the abyss with eternal fire."

name: "The Conflagration"
flavor: Everything was born from an unimaginable fire. Here, I'll show you.

name: "The Cure"
flavor: "We have a solution." - Ikora Rey, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

name: "The Gone"
flavor: "He came at me with a knife. I put out my hand and - just so - made him into ash."

name: "The Order"
flavor: "A fractured will is the hallmark of disorder…"

name: "The Risen Ones"
flavor: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

name: "The Tethering"
flavor: "The farther apart you pull two quarks, the harder they snap back."

name: "The Transcendent Mind"
flavor: "Other orders try to learn the laws of Light. We accept that Light transcends all law."

name: "The Unconquerable"
flavor: "Let's stop thinking about how to open the lock and start thinking about removing the wall."

name: "The Waking Dreams"
flavor: Awoken Warlocks ponder their own visions as whispers into the truths of Light and Dark.

name: "Tooth and Claw"
flavor: Reality grew from the carcasses of an infinity of might-have-beens.

name: "Trained Chaos"
flavor: "Control space and time. Mere matter and energy will follow."

name: "Twist of Fate"
flavor: "There will come a time when you can no longer see objects - only clouds of probability and law."

name: "Variable Flow"
flavor: "Your power flows through the bond. Remember what it represents."

name: "Wearable Collider"
flavor: Mm, yes, a fine cloak. But I have a supercompressed supercollider on my arm. Can your cloak split quarks?

name: "Willful Exodus"
flavor: "…'til even the stars heed our calling."

name: "Worm Gods' Boon"
flavor: They had a choice. They chose the hunger. They chose the Formless One. They chose the Worm Gods.

name: Barkhan Dune Bond
flavor: "The sandstorm that buries Meridian will unearth Vasconia." —Warlock saying

name: Binary Lazarus
flavor: Encrypted by the First Children at the Precipice of Flame, before the Exile.

name: Bond of Control
flavor: A Warlock's bond signifies control over the Traveler's Light. What 'control' means is a matter of debate.

name: Bond of Credulity
flavor: "They call me unorthodox. I call them boring." —Wen Jie

name: Bond of Emptying
flavor: Peace within. War without.

name: Bond of Focus
flavor: A bond is symbol, instrument, and warning. Light can reveal mysteries. But even a child knows not to stare into the sun.

name: Bond of Guardians
flavor: Bearing the devices of every Guardian class, this escutcheon represents Light united against Darkness.

name: Bond of Polarity
flavor: Some orders believe that Light and Darkness exist beyond the merely material, with a logic of their own.

name: Bond of Preparation
flavor: A Warlock needs nothing but a vigorous mind.

name: Bond of the Desolate
flavor: In honor of the Queen.

name: Bond of the Exile
flavor: "They who entered the Speaker's chambers as master and apprentice were bitter rivals when they left." —Brother Vance

name: Bond of the Fen
flavor: There's nothing out there. So why do we keep going back?

name: Bond of the Queen's Guard
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Bond of the Tilt
flavor: "Don't want to get rusty now, do we?" —Ikora Rey

name: Bond of the Universal
flavor: Some orders argue that Light and Darkness can be explained in the context of supersymmetric physics.

name: Bond of the Uprooted
flavor: Cut away the rot. Let the young trees take root.

name: Bond of the Wormlore
flavor: "They were two once. In the Darkness they joined. Such is the Hive's strength. And such is their hunger." —Eris Morn

name: Bond of Unknowing
flavor: Some orders assert that Light and Darkness are not bound by any system of reason or causality.

name: Bond of Veils
flavor: A thousand Thanatonauts on a thousand journeys have made only the tiniest of tears in death's veil.

name: Bond of Will
flavor: "Consider the word: bond. Remember, as you wield this power, that you are not alone." - Pujari, The Transcripts

name: Bond of Wonders
flavor: "The more unlikely it seems, the truer it is." —Wen Jie

name: Bone Circlet
flavor: A memento of the world Crota ruled.

name: Captured Solar Remnant
flavor: A grid of starfire burned into a single instant of Planck time.

name: Devils' Bond

name: Ebonthorn Bond

name: Felwinter's Iron Bond

name: Haliaetus Bond
flavor: "Nowhere to land. Gotta keep flying."

name: Heliopause Bond

name: Kallipolis Bond

name: Kells' Bond

name: Order of Guardians Bond

name: Pariah Bond

name: Seal of the Twin Eagle
flavor: Only the wind beneath you.

name: Seraph Bond

name: Skorri's Iron Bond
flavor: "Rise above, so that you may lift those below."

name: Spektar Bond
flavor: There are many shades of truth.

name: Spektar Haliaetus Bond
flavor: "Nowhere to land. Gotta keep flying."

name: Spektar Heliopause Bond
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Sublime Light Bond

name: Subterranean Bond

name: Terra Clasp
flavor: The Earth is ours to lose.

name: Thanatonaut's Bond

name: The Five Lives of Albios

name: Timor's Iron Bond
flavor: "Only those forged in Light can stand against the lurking shadows."

name: Union of the Consensus

flavor: We'll walk if we have to.

flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Astrolord Cloak

name: Bladedancer's Cloak

name: Bloodstained Hood
flavor: "Those Jaguar militant types seem a little extreme." —a person of inadequate ferocity

name: Brawler's Cloak

name: Buckaroo's Cloak

name: Chaos Cloak
flavor: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

name: Cloak of Atropos

name: Cloak of Desolation
flavor: Shield yourself from the night.

name: Cloak of Dredgen Yor
flavor: Before he took Pahanin's Light, Dredgen Yor ruled the Crucible, the notorious Thorn at his side.

name: Cloak of Hidden Agendas
flavor: "Tell a Titan only a madman would go. Tell a Warlock it's too complex." - Pahanin Errata

name: Cloak of Immanent War
flavor: A new dawn breaks. Feel how it burns.

name: Cloak of Keen Eyes
flavor: "My ancestors were born beyond the Walls, on the long march to the City."

name: Cloak of No Tomorrow
flavor: Tomorrow will be as yesterday was. There will always be a battle to be won.

name: Cloak of Oblivion
flavor: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

name: Cloak of Order
flavor: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

name: Cloak of Perception
flavor: "Have you walked the ruins? Seen the machines born from the lightning? We face a mighty foe."

name: Cloak of Ragged Fortune

name: Cloak of Repair
flavor: We'll carve our future through the will of the people.

name: Cloak of Reverence
flavor: The stylized twin arc represents the world beneath the Traveler.

name: Cloak of Seven Bones
flavor: "Let this bone I reaped in battle give me strength to reap again."

name: Cloak of Solitude

name: Cloak of Taniks
flavor: He of the endless troves of arms, and legs, and hearts, and lungs, and…

name: Cloak of Tekmor
flavor: When an old Hunter wears a simple cloak, ask yourself where she got it, and what the cloth remembers.

name: Cloak of the Apsides
flavor: "The Hunter creed calls us outward. And what do we find out there? Hard vacuum. Respect it."

name: Cloak of the Cosmonaut
flavor: Vladimir Komarov helped build and fly Earth's first ships. He gave his life to the frontier.

name: Cloak of the Dusktorn
flavor: "I'll remember the Light. Will it remember me?" - Sai Mota

name: Cloak of the Exile
flavor: "Was he exiled? Did he leave willingly? Was the parting angry? Peaceful? Is he dead? Alive? In a word: yes." —Sister Faora

name: Cloak of the Exodus
flavor: Find the way.

name: Cloak of the Hidden
flavor: "The shadows dance quickly among the dust. Make them your ally." - Eris

name: Cloak of the Ironsworn
flavor: "Those who find victory in the Crucible will win salvation for our City." - Iron Banner maxim

name: Cloak of the Justicars
flavor: In pursuit of the City's safety, our jurisdiction is unlimited.

name: Cloak of the Leopard
flavor: Legend says that no animal was more difficult to hunt than the leopard.

name: Cloak of the Mantis
flavor: "Patient camouflage and precise violence. No wonder they survived."

name: Cloak of the Pariah
flavor: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Cloak of the Reefrunners

name: Cloak of the Rising

name: Cloak of the Shadowjacks

name: Cloak of the Shadowsmiths

name: Cloak of the Sixth Reign
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Cloak of the Skypillar

name: Cloak of the Sojourn
flavor: The stars are calling.

name: Cloak of the Unborn
flavor: "Child asked me if I was a clock. I told her yes. I was keeping time until the world would be safe for her."

name: Cloak of the Unfactorable
flavor: "Could the Vex build a model of us? A simulated City, a whole simulated Earth, adrift in the ocean of the Vex intellect?"

name: Cloak of the Unflinching
flavor: Anyone who takes the pathway into orbit will never want to leave it. Challenge the universe.

name: Cloud Walker Tribute
flavor: A cloak which bears the emblem of the Cloud Walkers, the pioneers of the first Exodus.

name: Competitor Match
flavor: "Instinct tells you to cherish victory, but defeat holds all the lessons." —Lord Shaxx

name: Cosmic Joke
flavor: An infamous cloak, scavenged off the corpses of its owners numerous times on the frontier.

name: Cult/Trinary Star
flavor: The mark of the Trinary Star, the hidden cult who curse the Traveler's light.

name: Darkhollow Mantle
flavor: "To even exist in their space is to constantly demand your own existence." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Cloak
flavor: "Beyond the Reef. Beyond the Nine." —Arach Jalaal

name: Dead Zone Revolution
flavor: With each Dead Zone charted comes a new cloak pattern from the Hunter elite.

name: Devils' Cloak
flavor: "There are some bargains worthy of any risk."

name: Devils' Disguise
flavor: Hide your face.

name: Drifter's Cloak
flavor: Cut from City textile and worn as a mark of pride by Hunters with big dreams.

name: Dustwalker Cloak
flavor: A good survival cape can be used as a hull patch, bandage, tourniquet, pressure seal, picnic blanket...

name: Dynamo Cloak
flavor: "Your missions: protect the City. Look better than Warlocks. But don't look like you're trying." - Pahanin Errata

name: End Unsung
flavor: A humble cloak worn in tribute to the Guardians who met their end alone in the wild.

name: Extropic Cloak
flavor: "Child came for our robes today. He said the Awoken Hunters needed them, as they were cold." —Warlock doorlog

name: Fieldcraft Hood
flavor: Even vacuum-ready field wire armor should be kept out of the rain. Rig a hood.

name: Fixer Cloak
flavor: I solve problems.

name: Frumious Cloak
flavor: Tell the Warlocks your cloak is frabjous. They respect words they don't understand.

name: Ghost Angel Cloak
flavor: We are an army of the chosen dead.

name: Grinder's Cloak
flavor: "First, check your cloak for damage. Second, inspect yourself for major wounds." - Handbook of (Un)Controversial Advice

name: Gunslinger's Cloak
flavor: In the dark days before the Last City, all a Hunter had was the Light and a steady aim.

name: H_LD Starwinder Cloak
flavor: As the cloak frays, it reveals the ancient works of Li Qingzhao, carved in chips of bone.

name: Harbinger Hood
flavor: A pattern inspired by the legendary Awoken weapon.

name: Hardcase Cloak
flavor: If you learn nothing else, learn this: when a Hunter takes up the cloak of a dead comrade, this is a vow.

name: Heliopause Cloak
flavor: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

name: Highest Squidder
flavor: "Are you squidding me?"

name: Hood of the Night Sun
flavor: "I am not a dashing rogue. I am not a free spirit. I am a claw in the throat of the dark, and I will draw blood."

name: Hood of the Spawn
flavor: "Toland cracked the rune, or led us to believe he did. I told him it was either that, or the Hive have a hell of a recipe for beer." - Omar Agah

name: Hustler's Cloak
flavor: They say you will never find an impractical Hunter. But what do 'they' know about dashing cloaks?

name: Infinite Lines Cloak
flavor: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Iron Camelot Cloak
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Gheleon, he who was a true Guardian to the people.

name: Journey Hood
flavor: It's not the destination that matters.

name: Kallipolis Mantle
flavor: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

name: Kell's Cloak
flavor: "Here's my plan to be Kell. Fallen seem to respect violence and big capes. I'm really violent, and I found this cape."

name: Kellhunter's Hood
flavor: The strongest lead the pack.

name: Kings' Cloak
flavor: "Of which world? All of them."

name: Kings' Mantle
flavor: Fit for royalty.

name: Lead Scout's Cloak
flavor: "To clear mines: step on mine. Wait for Ghost revival. Step on mine 2. Wait for Ghost. Step on - "

name: Legend of Six Coyotes
flavor: A cloak fashioned after the legendary Hunters who first scouted beyond the Cosmodrome wall.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "You didn't tell me this treasure was in the red mists of Murmuring Rock. Count me out."

name: Makeshift Scarf
flavor: The Hunter's cloak speaks to their personality. Your Ghost scrounged up this tough synthetic wrap, marked with an ancient double-headed eagle.

name: Mantle of Efrideet
flavor: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

name: Mantle of Gheleon
flavor: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

name: Mantle of Perun
flavor: Your mark be made, by thunder's crack or lightning's strike.

name: Mantle of Sublime Light
flavor: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

name: Maverick's Cloak
flavor: "Bright colors are Mother Nature's way of saying 'don't mess with me.' We like a lot of her ideas."

name: Melting Point
flavor: In the Crucible, you'll find yours.

name: Nagari Cloak
flavor: In this age of Light and fire, simple skills still endure. Hunters embroider signs of war and loss on their cloaks.

name: Neuroghast Cloak
flavor: To control your opponents, you must first control your own body.

name: Night Rain Cloak
flavor: Hunters constantly tweak and upgrade their armor. A cloak is the best mark of recognition.

name: Nightmask Cloak
flavor: "They say the Crucible is preparation for the frontier. I see it the other way around." - Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Nightstalker Cloak
flavor: Live and die by the draw of a bow.

name: Nightstalker's Cloak
flavor: "We are the rangers, the keen-eyed scouts who stalk the Darkness where it dwells."

name: Not A Fallen Hood
flavor: Friendly fire is as deadly as any Fallen skiff, so some Hunters choose cloaks for pure visibility.

name: Octopus Cloak
flavor: "If human extinction seems imminent, try to relax. You're just giving cephalopods a shot." - Pahanin Errata

name: On the Marsh
flavor: Swamp camouflage is the hottest fashion these days.

name: Ones and Zeroes
flavor: Maybe that's all we really are.

name: Pennant Cloak
flavor: Guardians often band together and form close-knit teams to achieve victory in the Crucible.

name: Pilgrim's Cloak
flavor: How many fell on the road to the City? How few made the last leg of the journey with a Ghost over their shoulders?

name: Pleiades Hood
flavor: The enemy sees beyond visual light, so cloth camouflage is difficult. No sense looking drab.

name: Quantum-Phoenix Blue
flavor: A pattern born from waveform flux in the probability kilns of the City.

name: Queen's Arrow
flavor: City artists created this pattern to honor the Queen of the Awoken.

name: Racer's Scarf
flavor: All your rivals will see are your contrails in the distance.

name: Red Eclipse Cloak
flavor: Still we shine.

name: Rihla Mantle
flavor: The City is hungry for tales of your exploits.

name: Rustworn Cloak
flavor: It's been stained and torn by old metal. But whatever it went through, it survived.

name: Shattered Vault Cloak
flavor: The machines are not invincible.

name: Shroud of Flies
flavor: They gather where death steps.

name: Silent Specter
flavor: We linger in the wild, stalking and exploring without a sound.

name: Solar Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Solar energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Vatch.

name: Spektar Aspriet Cloak
flavor: "Fly high. Strike hard. Repeat." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Spektar Cloak
flavor: More than one color stains the battlefield.

name: Spektar Heliopause Cloak
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Spektar Infinite Cloak
flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Spektar Kallipolis Cloak
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Squid Pro Quo
flavor: "Yes, my love for cephalopods is well documented." —Pahanin Errata

name: Strength of the Pack
flavor: A pattern worn by Ana Bray during the fateful battle of the Twilight Gap.

name: Takanome Ranger's Hood
flavor: In the darkest days of the Dark Age, camouflage was our only defense.

name: The Ishtar Dilemma
flavor: Never did answer Sundaresh's question, now did we?

name: Tracker's Wrap
flavor: This cut-down cloak marks the bearer as a rising Hunter, newly reborn and eager to roam.

name: Trailblazer's Hood
flavor: You're the first! At least, the first to live to tell about it.

name: Unbelievably Old Cloak
flavor: Look at all that...character.

name: Vaquero's Cloak
flavor: Never did like being in one place for too long.

name: Venom of Ikaheka
flavor: The sigil of the snake, said to represent the fluid lethality of a true Hunter.

name: Void Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Void energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Numoc.

name: Warden's Hood
flavor: "I always target Taken Psions first. That way I use one bullet instead of 20." —Cayde-6

name: Wetwork Cloak
flavor: [this passage intentionally redacted]

name: Wolfswood Cloak
flavor: In our darkest hour, nine Iron Wolves emerged from the ruins.

name: Wolves' Cloak
flavor: "Run with me, we've new trails to stalk."

name: 77 Wizard
flavor: The Exo called Gaunt is a gunsmith famous for his Wizards.

name: Amethyst Reign-99
flavor: C'est magnifique!

name: Andromeda
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the princess of the night sky.

name: Angelic Acid
flavor: Cast out the world's demons with this needle-nosed plasma lash.

name: Ashraven's Flight
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Badlands-FR4
flavor: Stark red rock. Arid sun. Long shadows. Find your spot.

name: Bronzed Nox Volo V
flavor: A well-balanced Cassoid firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Caldera-FR1
flavor: Boiling air. Obscuring steam. Calm nerves.

name: Dämmerung FR3
flavor: Manufactured with foamed spinmetal, the FR3's lightweight build makes it popular in rough terrain.

name: Dämmerung FR5
flavor: The snubfire FR5, built around a nugget of null-mass, offers superb agility and power.

name: Darkblade's Spite
flavor: "In the Hive ways of old he challenged Oryx. He failed." —Eris Morn

name: Elevating Vision
flavor: Find a way to the top.

name: Eosphoros FR4
flavor: Dawn is within our sights.

name: Exile's Curse
flavor: It's a blessing in disguise.

name: Feral Spark FR6
flavor: Foaming at the mouth.

name: Final Rest II
flavor: An advanced energy weapon modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Futile Gesture
flavor: If you like the weapon, then the name's talking about the enemy. If you don't...

name: Give/Take Equation
flavor: As good as you get. As much as you can. All of the time.

name: Harrowed Midha's Reckoning
flavor: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

name: Heath-FR3
flavor: Sloping hills. Clawing brambles. Bitter herbs.

name: Helios FR5
flavor: Coiled with fieldweave conductors, the Helios FR5 is portable hellfire.

name: Hitchhiker FR4
flavor: A fusion rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Light of the Abyss
flavor: In the dark beyond the Hellmouth there is a terrible need for light.

name: LIGHT/Beware
flavor: More light! More light!

name: Long Far Gone
flavor: But I still remember.

name: Midha's Reckoning
flavor: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

name: Murmur
flavor: "The Hive have learned our secrets. Take them back with fire AND lightning." -Eris

name: Murmur
flavor: "The Hive have learned our secrets. Take them back with fire AND lightning." -Eris

name: Nox Acror IV
flavor: It is an unbinding, a tearing, a siphoning. That is the power of your hand.

name: Nox Astur III
flavor: Let your mind be fleet and subtle as the night-soaring hawk.

name: Nox Cantor II
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The NCII is a multirole design that feeds on hydrogen isotope reactant.

name: Nox Cantor II
flavor: The well-balanced NCIII fusion rifle balances power with ease of manufacture.

name: Nox Cantor V
flavor: The NCV has an augmented firing system, allowing for in-field customization.

name: Nox Crocia I
flavor: For you see beyond the fabric of night.

name: Nox Fury V
flavor: The NFV offers a multirole platform wired for punishment.

name: Nox Inergia IV
flavor: The energies of the universe are eager to heed your call.

name: Nox Praeli III
flavor: All that is dark is not Darkness.

name: Nox Revus II
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The NRII uses neodymium discharge clamps for more precise fire.

name: Omolon Test FR1
flavor: Omolon prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

name: Painted Helios FR4
flavor: A quick-firing Omolon fusion rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Panta Rhei
flavor: Everything flows.

name: Perun's Fire
flavor: An energy weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Plan C
flavor: Good fighters have contingency plans. Great fighters don't need them.

name: PLUG ONE.1
flavor: Move with the current.

name: Pocket Infinity
flavor: You cannot shake the feeling that this is less a weapon than a doorway.

name: Praetorian Foil
flavor: Erase the future.

name: Primed Nox Revus IV
flavor: An advanced Cassoid fusion rifle with extended range, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Prism Schism
flavor: Just look at all the pretty lights!

name: Prost FR2
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The Prost's cut-down projector enables rapid fire.

name: Prost FR3
flavor: Wired for confrontation, the Prost FR3 uses a fast-snap chamber for rapid fire.

name: Purifier VII
flavor: Executor-issued energy weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Queenbreakers' Bow
flavor: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

name: Servant of Askor
flavor: Burn away the ether.

name: Silvered Eos FR4
flavor: A quick-firing Omolon fusion rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: SK5 Type-Null
flavor: A multirole Vanguard-issue fusion rifle, modified for enhanced performance.

name: Sleeper Simulant
flavor: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

name: Snakebite Surgeon
flavor: The venom numbs the burn.

name: Solas FR2
flavor: Directed energy weapon with a short charge cycle. The lightweight Solas is built for close quarters.

name: Solas FR5
flavor: This FR5 variant contains a hard-wrapped induction system to optimize its charge.

name: Spindevil 3AA
flavor: This crisply accurate fusion rifle pins its performance on a mastercraft field muzzle.

name: Split Shifter Pro
flavor: Combat plasma discharge is no matter for amateurs.

name: Susanoo
flavor: The fearsome storms of today become the healing waters of tomorrow.

name: Techeun Force
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Techeun Force
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Techeun Force
flavor: A Techeun's body shimmers with electronic implants and augments.

name: Techeun Rage
flavor: We honor your sacrifice.

name: Telesto
flavor: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

name: Tengoku FR1
flavor: Fusion Rifles are directed-energy weapons with a short charge cycle. The FR1 is a common multirole design.

name: Tengoku FR2
flavor: Fusion Rifles are directed-energy weapons with a short charge cycle. The FR2 is a multirole design built to kill swarms of light targets.

name: Tengoku FR2a
flavor: Fusion Rifles are directed-energy weapons with a short charge cycle. The FR2a is a multirole design built to kill swarms of light targets.

name: That Beautiful Glow
flavor: Don't go into the light!

name: The Calming
flavor: An energy weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Frenzy
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, augmented, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Trolley Problem
flavor: Pull the lever. It's the right thing to do.

name: The Vacancy
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Vortex
flavor: An advanced energy weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: Thesan FR4
flavor: Hasten the dawn with the new Omolon Thesan FR4.

name: Tundra-FR3
flavor: White skies. Unyielding ground. Misted breath. Just one shot.

name: Vex Mythoclast
flavor: ...a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time into…

name: Amethyst Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who are fond of the Reef.

name: Blue Spine Shell
flavor: For Ghosts with a sharp tongue.

name: Bold Red Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who aren't afraid to make themselves a target.

name: Brave Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have been there since the beginning.

name: Competitive Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who stood with their Guardians as they became champions of the Crucible.

name: Consensus Shell
flavor: Ghosts who give testimony before the City's great Consensus often remake their shells in this traditional form.

name: Consumed Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have found a new shape.

name: Crimson Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who want a little glamour.

name: Dread Explorer Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who scouted the Dreadnaught and lived to tell the tale.

name: Foundry Shell
flavor: City's artisans welcome the deep memories and painstaking finesse of the Ghosts.

name: Frontier Shell
flavor: Tough, rugged, and defiantly colored - ready to brave the high frontier. Ghosts can self-modify at will.

name: Generalist Shell
flavor: Born from the Traveler, built of machinery and Light, the Ghost is your companion and faithful guide.

name: Intrusion Shell
flavor: Rigged for eavesdropping, surveillance, and intrusion into unfriendly networks. Ghosts can self-modify at will.

name: Iron Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who are forged in battle.

name: Ishtar Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths on Venus.

name: Joyride Shell
flavor: For Ghosts that like to feel the wind on their casings.

name: Kingslayer Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who were there when Oryx fell.

name: Mare Cognitum Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths on the Moon.

name: Meridian Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths on Mars.

name: Metropolitan Shell
flavor: For a Ghost of the Last City.

name: Pale Dawn Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who trust in the Light.

name: Purple Spine Shell
flavor: For ghosts with a "prickly" personality.

name: Pursuer Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who are always chasing the next challenge.

name: Questing Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who love adventure.

name: Redux Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who favor a new take on a classic look.

name: Scholar Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have contributed to the City's knowledge.

name: Shipwright Shell
flavor: Sometimes the best way to troubleshoot a faulty NLS drive is to dive in and get your shell dirty.

name: Skywatch Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have forged new paths in the Cosmodrome.

name: Standard Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who prefer the classics.

name: Sugary Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who enjoy the sweet taste of Crucible victories.

name: Sunlit Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who believe.

name: Turquoise Shell
flavor: For Ghosts with bright personalities.

name: Vanguard Shell
flavor: This shell marks the Ghost as a trusted instrument of the Guardian Vanguard.

name: Vanguard Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have proven themselves as leaders in the field time and time again.

name: Verdant Shell
flavor: For Ghosts looking to brighten their Guardian's day.

name: Weathered Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who have braved the elements.

name: Winter Sky Shell
flavor: For Ghosts who feel blue.

name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

name: Acolyte Rung
flavor: "Mota was so close -- clawing her way out with bones torn from the Acolytes. Her fall -- Omnigul. You honor her." - Eris

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. Activated polymer will self-shape to grip your favorite knife.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: The coil complex on the left gauntlet may experience alarming mass fluctuations.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. Fieldweave grafted for strong, accurate throws.

name: Astrolord Grips
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Battuta
flavor: Some of the City's best-selling authors are Hunters-turned-travel writers.

name: Blindsight Sleeves
flavor: "With the sight, I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Try not to get bogged down with the little things.

name: Brusilov
flavor: One part curiosity, one part obligation, two parts reckless pride.

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: It's all in the execution.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: "Your job on the fireteam is to answer the question 'Can we kill that thing?' Make sure the answer is always yes."

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: "During the Hildian Campaign, modified Fallen armor was more common among the Reef troops than the standard issue."

name: Cryptid
flavor: The lovingly crafted Cryptid family includes a kinematically charged joint massager - on every finger!

name: Darkhollow Grasps
flavor: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Grips
flavor: "At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Desolate Grips
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

name: Dogged Gage
flavor: One doesn't need sleeves to keep knives inside them.

name: Don't Touch Me
flavor: Amputated from a creature that stumbled out of a Vex gate. A vestigial defensive reflex still remains.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Shiftwire can induce nerve activity. It makes mere skin feel like dead plastic.

name: Elector's Grips
flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

name: Exodus Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: Stay at the top of the food chain.

name: Forester
flavor: The wilderness reclaimed Earth after the Collapse. Now Hunters reclaim the wilderness.

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: As we climbed the tern cliffs he moved their nests aside, real gently. At the top he strangled the Fallen sentry. Same hands."

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: Careful around the upholstery.

name: Grips of No Tomorrow
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: The trigger action is the central action, and so it must feel euphoric.

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Grasps
flavor: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Grips
flavor: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

name: Immanent War Grips
flavor: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

name: Infinite Lines Grips
flavor: "I saw three queens. No, two. No...just one." —RECORD 351-CHASM-6915

name: Iron Breed Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Grips
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Perun, she who hunted the Darkness where it dwelt.

name: Iron Companion Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: Micro-collectors absorb ambient moisture.

name: Justicar's Grips
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT AGGRESSIVE HANDSHAKE. Pleased to meet you.

name: Kallipolis Grips
flavor: We cannot win the war beyond our walls without first winning the people within them.

name: Kellhunter's Rally
flavor: The Kell's first command is a word. If the word goes unheeded, the Kell's second command is the blade.

name: Khepri's Sting
flavor: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

name: Komarov
flavor: The gauntlets include extensible microtools for fine work on spacecraft systems.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "All the way to Venus I tracked her. But in the jungles of the Ishtar Sink the trail vanished."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: Mars is far, far out. Light crawls across the gap from the City. Hunters respect that isolation.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Though compatible with organic humanoids, Neuroghast armor was optimized for prosthetic or Exo limbs.

name: Order's Grip
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Prime Zealot Gloves
flavor: Forged from the remnants of broken Vex. Some of the component matter is older than the solar system.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Grips
flavor: The hand of the throne.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: Leather flash conceals an exquisite self-aligning coil pattern.

name: Rogue
flavor: A pauldron-mounted transceiver helps Hunters and their Ghosts stay in touch with their ships.

name: Rustburner
flavor: The gauntlets include a dedicated proprioceptor net for knife work.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: In combat, every motion must be mindless and perfect.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Some Hunters boast of things they find. We boast of places we fly.

name: Sealed Ahamkara's Grasps
flavor: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations...oh bearer mine.

name: Shinobu's Vow
flavor: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: The wire in these gloves has been tweaked to grow warm when your knife pierces enemy hide.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Slippery as an eel.

name: Sleeves of the Iron Lords
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Sleeves of the Pariah
flavor: "They cast him out. But his words never left." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Snakeline
flavor: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

name: Sojourn Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: A Hunter's armor must be nimble, tough, and wearable - because it will be their only home.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: "In the Dark Age, before the safety of the City, before the rise of the Tower, there were only the Rangers." —Chiyoko Mey

name: Vaquero
flavor: Howdy.

name: Vermilion Stripe

name: Warden's Rally

name: Watchers' Grips

name: Winged Sun Sleeves
flavor: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "In the Reef, you use what you can find, even if all you can find is Fallen."

name: Young Ahamkara's Spine

name: ACD/0 Feedback Fence

name: Agema
flavor: This gauntlet pattern boasts lightning-fast maintenance cycles.

name: Arihant

name: Armada
flavor: Spinmetal beneath the fieldplate. A caress beneath the crush.

name: Astrolord Gauntlets
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Blindsight Gauntlets
flavor: "With the sight I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: They can hear you coming. They are terrified.

name: Commando Custom

name: Commando
flavor: A chemoreceptor array on the right gauntlet detects explosives and cues up handling instructions.

name: Dead Light Gauntlets
flavor: "At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Desolate Gauntlets
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

name: DURGA-GNT

name: Duskrender

name: Elector's Gauntlets
flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

name: Exodus Gauntlets
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Fieldplate

name: Firebreak
flavor: Built for forward battle, the Firebreak patterns reward diligent maintenance.

name: Garuda
flavor: "Do not think your precious Tower has all the answers, or that your new rank will make you any better at fighting the Darkness." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: The gauntlet, vambrace, and joints of a Titan's arms must withstand colossal forces.

name: Gauntlets of No Tomorrow
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Gauntlets of the Exile

name: Gauntlets of the Pariah

name: Gauntlets of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Gwalior

name: Harrowed War Numen's Fist

name: Hesperos

name: Highlander

name: Holdfast

name: Illyrian

name: Immanent War Gauntlets
flavor: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

name: Immolation Fists
flavor: "Don't let this sacrifice be in vain."

name: Infinite Lines Gauntlets

name: Iron Breed Gauntlets
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Gauntlets
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Jolder, she whose mighty hammer taught the Darkness fear.

name: Iron Companion Gauntlets
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Gauntlets
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: "From the wall's shadows to the furthest shores."

name: Jovian Guard

name: Kabr's Brazen Grips

name: Kallipolis Gauntlets

name: Kellslayer's Grips

name: Knight

name: Knightbone Guard

name: Lightmail

name: Mau'ual's Maulers

name: Molniya

name: Molniya Custom
flavor: Mighty field drivers put armor-shattering force into every punch.

name: Monarch's Gauntlets
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Monitor

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Emonda Swale. Gave her last full measure in the Cosmodrome." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: The previous owner of these gauntlets left nothing behind but a vague smell of sweat.

name: No Back Up Plans
flavor: No ammo? No problem.

name: Objekt 959 Guards

name: Oblivion Gauntlets
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Order's Gauntlets
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Pacorus

name: Queen's Guard Gauntlets

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Haptic pads provide feedback on weapon performance.

name: Ruin Wings

name: Scoutmail

name: Spearhead

name: Spektar (All Types)

name: Taroudant

flavor: Take what is yours.

flavor: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Barkhan Dune
flavor: "They say water once fell on Mars. Can you imagine it?"

name: Bindcaster

name: Blindsight Gloves
flavor: "With the sight I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Born Spark
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost using nearby mass, this fieldweave handles life support and little else.

name: Chroma Vow
flavor: Feedback from a botched technique can cause agonizing burns. Fight through the pain.

name: Claws of Ahamkara
flavor: Look at all this life, oh bearer mine. There is so much left to burn...

name: Code Fire
flavor: Many Warlock techniques are channeled through the hands, so the gloves are a complex weave.

name: Cormorant Line
flavor: We spread our arms wide enough to envelop the world.

name: Dead Light Grips
flavor: At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Deathsinger's Grip
flavor: Grip the universe. Reshape it. Disregard the screams.

name: Desolate Gloves
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

flavor: A Warlock understands the power of symbols. Treat a Hunter's cloak and a Titan's mark with respect.

name: Nerigal Savant

name: Nothing Manacles

name: Ophidian Aspect
flavor: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

name: Order's Gloves
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

flavor: "They cast him out. But his words never left." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Queen's Guard Gloves
flavor: The hand of the throne.

name: Salicin Fen
flavor: "It wasn't until his fifth life that the Ahamkara spoke to him. By then it was too late." —The Five Lives of Albios

name: Samsara

name: Scalpel Wing

name: Solo Clade
flavor: We are the last.

name: Spektar (All Types)

name: Terra Bide

An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

All matter is woven together in the same tapestry. Pull one thread and everything changes.
All matter tends toward entropy. Your hand will speed it on its way.

The Ganon points as easy as coming home. Some devilish cunning keeps the frame both strong and light.

name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Crucible variant. Fieldwire density and peak rise exceeds safe long-term standards.

name: Achlyophage Symbiote
flavor: "They told me it would eat my thoughts and leave me full of Light."

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. Rebreather comes with optional vaporized adrenaline.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: Patterned by a grizzled Hunter and a Praxic Warlock, this remarkable armor records everything for later analysis.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. The nanowire mesh shields the oxygen filters from unwanted particulates.

name: Astrolord Cover
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: ATS/8 ARACHNID
flavor: Advanced tactical sensorium. Induced hallucinations integrate broad-spectrum targeting data.

name: Battuta
flavor: The first Hunters were also the first mapmakers. Every Guardian owes them a debt.

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Learn the swamp's secrets. Keep the swamp's secrets. Lie awake at night, horrified by the swamp's secrets.

name: Bright Shield
flavor: Protection from the slings and arrows of life, but not much else.

name: Brusilov
flavor: Every Hunter leaves the City knowing it could be for the last time.

name: Burning Eye Mask
flavor: "There are eyes beyond our eyes. Lamps of nothingness, voids of brightness." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: Rawr.

name: Celestial Nighthawk
flavor: Starlight is your guide. No vacuum will contain you.

name: Circuit Defender
flavor: A clever Guardian knows which gates to pass through and which ones to pass by.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: "Don't let your pride kill you. When you see a thorny target, call for a team. Consider them an audience, if that helps."

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: Possession of Fallen armor has become a point of pride among the Reef Corsairs.

name: Cover of No Tomorrows
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Cover of the Exile
flavor: "Don't you find it strange that the one called The Speaker rarely has anything useful to say?" —Sayings of the Disciples

name: Cryptid
flavor: Seek out other Guardians when the howling loneliness grows too deep. Pretend it's a chance meeting, though.

name: Cultist's Cover
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Darkhollow Mask
flavor: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our Universe." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Cover
flavor: "Listen. Some stars won't stop calling to us." —Arach Linde

name: Desolate Cover
flavor: A smell of ozone. A distant scream. A feeling of dread.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Titan and a Hunter crash on Mars. Titan's helmet stops a Cabal slug. Hunter's helmet stops her from starving. Who lives?

name: Elector's Mask
flavor: Hide your face, but let your voice be heard.

name: Exodus Cover
flavor: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

name: Fear Eater

name: Forester

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: "Shake it off. We've all been dead before."

name: Gravebreaker

name: Graviton Forfeit

name: H_LD Starwinder

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Mask
flavor: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our Universe." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Mask
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Helm of the Jade Rabbit

name: Hood of Malok

name: Infinite Lines Mask

name: Iron Breed Mask
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Casque
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Efrideet, she whose keen eye never missed her mark.

name: Iron Companion Mask
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Mask
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife

name: Justicar's Mask
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT SKULL MOUNT. Let us find prey.

name: Kallipolis Mask
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Kellhunter's Sight
flavor: A Kell's authority is like that of a sniper. You can't see everything, but as long as they believe you can…"

name: Knucklehead Radar
flavor: You can see the point, right? Who wants to team up with one?

name: Komarov
flavor: Never lose your bearings. A disoriented Hunter cannot select vital targets or track lines of flight.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "Some of 'em survived. I know a fellow says he saw a wish dragon on Jupiter a ways back."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: Success depends on meticulous preparation. Scour-proof your visors and rig backup sensors, or risk fighting blind.

name: Mantic Zealot Helm
flavor: Forged from the cores of Hezen Vex. If you feel a sense of revelation, remove immediately and inject antientheogens.

name: Mask of the Pariah
flavor: The sun must set before it will rise again." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Mask of the Third Man
flavor: It wasn't me. It was the Third Man."

flavor: Victory is in sight.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Embedded neural nodes improve the biological connections between mind and body.

name: Oblivion Cover

name: Order's Mask
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Prime Zealot Helm
flavor: Forged from the cores of Hezen Vex. If you feel a sense of revelation, remove immediately and inject antientheogens.

name: Queen's Guard Mask

name: Raku Vindicator

name: Sojourn Cover
flavor: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

name: Spektar (All Types)

name: Stratus White

name: The Waiting Crown
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Tracker

name: Unyielding Casque

name: Vaquero

name: Agema White

flavor: BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)

name: Astrolord Helm
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Bright Ward

name: BRONTIOS

name: Circuit Keeper

name: Commando Custom

name: Commando

name: Crash Helmet

name: Cultist's Helm
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Darkblade Helm

name: Dead Light Helm

name: Desolate Helm

name: Duskrender

name: Elector's Casque

name: Exodus Helm

name: Gatewatch

name: Golden Bull Mask

name: Harrowed War Numen's Crown

name: Heliopause Helm

name: Helm of No Tomorrow

name: Helm of the Pariah
flavor: "The sun must set before it will rise again." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Helm of the Seven

name: Holdfast

name: Immanent War Helm

name: Iron Breed Great Helm
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Kallipolis Crown

flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

flavor: "Show me all that I have yet to rule."

flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

flavor: A smell of ozone. A distant scream. A feeling of dread.

name: Harrowed Mouth of Ur
flavor: For the more Light the worms consume, the hungrier they become.

flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Hood of No Tomorrow
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

flavor: "Don't you find it strange that the one called The Speaker rarely has anything useful to say?" —Sayings of the Disciples

flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

name: Immanent War Hood

flavor: "I saw Darkness. No Light, no Earth, no air. Only Darkness. I...I can't breathe..." —RECORD 342-CHASM-6827

name: Iron Breed Hood
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Hood
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Felwinter, he who stared into the Void.

flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Kallipolis Hood
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

flavor: "Crows fly far. Bring us whispers of things to come." —Variks

name: Momentum Guard
flavor: The dreamer reaches for the sun. The survivor knows when it is out of reach.

name: Monolith Bleed

name: Mouth of Ur
flavor: For the more Light the worms consume, the hungrier they become.

flavor: Some early Warlock orders embraced anonymity, preferring to walk in public with a concealing hood.

name: Nerigal Savant
flavor: The enemy is only another algorithm. Simplify it, solve it, and set it in its place.

name: Obsidian Mind
flavor: Power from the ash.

name: Order's Hood
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Pariah Hood
flavor: "The sun must set before it will rise again." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Queen's Guard Hood
flavor: "Show me all that I have yet to rule."

name: Racing Wings
flavor: Take flight.

name: Raven Sheath

name: Samsara
flavor: "Personally, I've lost track of how many times I've died." —Ikora Rey

name: Scalpel Wing

name: Seraph
flavor: "Maybe we were someplace good, you know. And then the Ghosts took us away."

name: Skull of Dire Ahamkar
flavor: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

name: Solo Clade
flavor: Start anew.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Symmetry Fang
flavor: There are six factors in true Csikszentmihalyian flow. First is the loss of self.

name: THE STAG
flavor: Oh, deer goodness!

name: Talion Grace
flavor: A certain keyphrase will induce megalomania, for battles that demand the fury of a terrible will.

name: Tengu Operant

name: Terra Bide

name: The Ram
flavor: ...PRAISE ME...

name: The Waiting Crown
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Unity Clade

name: Vanth Orcus 0A0X

name: Vector Oath

name: Viper Spine
flavor: Behold - the bearer of Light.

name: Aether CSm
flavor: How will we know when we've found all of the secrets?

name: Against All Odds
flavor: Threat assessment calculates your odds of survival at 3,721:1...unless you pull this trigger.

name: Arighan's Blossom
flavor: Built in tribute to a legend.

name: Arma Engine DOA
flavor: Heavy firepower modified to fit the exacting specifications of Dead Orbit's expanding arsenal.

name: Backscratcher 9.0
flavor: Feels so good. For you, not them.

name: Bane of the Taken
flavor: The king is dead.

name: Baron's Ambition
flavor: "To crack open that depraved Earth-Servitor. To use its secrets to reclaim the Great Machine..." —Translated from Fallen Language

name: BFF 2.0
flavor: Sometimes, no matter how much it hurts, you just can't pass up a chance to upgrade.

name: Bretomart's Stand
flavor: A heavy-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Bronzed Thutmose-D
flavor: A powerful Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: BTRD-345
flavor: A multirole Vanguard machine gun. The serial number memorializes the number of kills the prototype scored in field test.

name: BTRD-345
flavor: Better than the rest.

name: Chain of Orbiks-Fel
flavor: The destruction of the Wolfship Orbiks-Fel during the Reef Wars is commemorated with every round fired.

name: Corrective Measure
flavor: It breaks the rules of reality as ruthlessly as it shatters your foes.

name: Cyrus-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Cyrus Bravo slams targets with massive slugs, putting damage above all else.

name: Darius-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Darius Bravo slams targets with massive slugs, putting damage above all else.

name: Darius-C
flavor: This high-powered machine gun delivers inertia-coupled ram rounds, inflicting extraordinary damage.

name: Deviant Gravity-A
flavor: A machine gun modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Diluvian 10/4x
flavor: Tossed upon the seas of war and tragedy.

name: Formerly Penitent
flavor: Belt-fed absolution.

name: Genghis-E

name: Genghis-E1

name: Hannibal-E
flavor: This Echo variant is rigged for destruction through the delivery of sustained heavy fire.

name: Harrowed Qullim's Terminus
flavor: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

name: Horologium
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the clock of the night sky.

name: Jolder's Hammer
flavor: A machine gun forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Karst-MG4
flavor: Yawning caves. Clinging damp. Hidden alcoves. Stay sharp.

name: Lacustrine-MG4
flavor: Taste of water. Scrape of dirt. Swath of grass. Take aim.

name: Lunation CSc
flavor: How shall we measure the passage of time?

name: Maria-MG3
flavor: The nothingness dispenser.

name: MG18A Harm's Way
flavor: Dark plains. Starry skies. Clear air. Reclaim the range.

name: Nihilist CSc
flavor: How do you make meaning from battle with chaos incarnate?

name: Objection IV
flavor: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Pacifier X
flavor: Executor-issued heavy-fire weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Painted Artemisia-D
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke heavy machine gun, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Phenomena CSm
flavor: To the wondering eye, what is not a miracle?

name: Planetary CSc
flavor: What planet will not, one day soon, sing of your deeds?

name: Prestige IV
flavor: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Qua Brecan I
flavor: The science of savagery lies in the smallest of weaknesses.

name: Qua Roris I
flavor: Some minds are a palace. Others, a prison. A Warlock's is both.

name: Qullim's Terminus
flavor: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

name: Red River Mk. 40
flavor: It'll live up to its name, just as long as the target actually bleeds something red.

name: Rift Valley-MG3
flavor: Wound in the earth. Long vectors. Clean shots. Our dream, and yours.

name: Ruin Wake
flavor: Before you, only victory. Behind you, only conquest.

name: Sargon-A
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-A Team Support Weapon is an all-purpose death machine.

name: Sargon-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon B-series delivers an improved fluorocarbon cooling system.

name: Sargon-B1
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-B1 Team Support Weapon is an answer to Fallen shock tactics.

name: Sargon-B2
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-B2 is a general-purpose weapon noted for its pleasant ergonomics.

name: Sargon-C
