name: Sawtooth Oscillator
flavor: Additive synthesis, where A is amplitude and B is bullets in their face.

name: Song of Ir Yût
flavor: It is the song of endings.

name: Spirit of Alliance
flavor: named by a very optimistic Earthborn Awoken, or his equally oblivious Reefborn counterpart.

name: SudaZomba-3
flavor: Sing along. The rhythm's not hard to catch.

name: Super Good Advice
flavor: This weapon is full of it.

name: Tamerlane-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Tamerlane Bravo is a long-range support weapon with excellent precision for its class.

name: Tamerlane-C3
flavor: The Tamerlane-C3 team support gun boasts a mag-suspended precision barrel and onboard electronics.

name: Tamerlane-E1
flavor: The heavy Echo-1 Tamerlane uses sapphire wiring to integrate tactical systems.

name: The Culling
flavor: A machine gun named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Infinite Theorem
flavor: In the mirrorlike crags of the Fields of Glass, a single mote of dust produces infinite reflections.

name: THE SWARM
flavor: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

name: The Unseeing Eye
flavor: "It is the blind eye that knows most keenly what it does not see." —Parables of the Allspring

name: The Variable
flavor: A heavy-fire weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: Thunderlord
flavor: "They rest quiet on fields afar…for this is no ending, but the eye."

name: Unending Deluge III
flavor: When it rains…

name: Wolves' Bane
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Wolves' Bane
flavor: During the Hildian Campaign, the Queen had need of weapons that could fire in a vacuum as well as an atmosphere.

name: Wolves' Curse
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Xerxes-C
flavor: Conquer new worlds with the decisive thunderclap of the Xerxes' heavy rounds.

name: Xerxes-E
flavor: Beneath the loud color scheme is an intricate mechanism utterly devoted to the delivery of brute force.

name: Xerxes-E1
flavor: Echo-1 variant of the popular Xerxes. The weapon's corkscrew heart pumps coolant blood.

name: Zombie Apocalypse WF47
flavor: Ready for one breed of armageddon.

name: "Atlas's Burden"
flavor: "Other ages had the phalanx, the carrier, the KKV. Now you are the defining weapons system of our time."

name: "Blood and Mortar"
flavor: "A distraction? The Crucible challenges our best. It is the finest training the City could ask."

name: "Cast in Blood"
flavor: "The naysayers in Consensus don't understand that we LIKE to fight each other." - Ain Suhu-ässä

name: "The Mandate"
flavor: "We reject this cumbersome doctrine of interdependence. Every solitary Titan must be a standfast against the dark."

name: "Ultimateless"
flavor: Those who bear this mark vow to always test the limits of Light against the Light itself.

name: Avenger Mark
flavor: "I require no miracles. We will reclaim our worlds with systematic, aggressive action against enemy assets. "

name: Bastion Mark
flavor: Field repairs are part of the Titan creed, but the particularly devoted clip spare tools to their mark.

name: Dead Light Mark
flavor: "Beyond the City. Yes, beyond the Traveler." —Arach Jalaal

name: Deep Stone Crypt
flavor: A badge illustrating the infamous subroutine which seeded the first Exo consciousness.

name: Defender's Mark
flavor: At Six Fronts, defending the Wall was not enough. Titans had to become a wall.

name: Devils' Mark
flavor: The battle never ends.

name: First Pillar Mark
flavor: The many strategic victories of the First Pillar Order are not without cost.

name: Five Mile Mark
flavor: Radagast's Host made it five miles from the City's first walls. This pattern commemorates their march.

name: Formation Mark
flavor: Crucible tactics explore the tension between team cohesion and individual bravura.

name: Freeholder's Memory
flavor: The symbol of the great city of Freehold, the lost gem of Mars.

name: Garuda Mark
flavor: Forged in fire and darkness. Lit up like a thousand thousand suns.

name: Golden Hour Mark
flavor: I wear this in service. I earned this by sacrifice.

name: Heliopause Mark
flavor: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

name: Hesperonaut Mark
flavor: Our heritage is not one of war, but of exploration.

name: Holborn's Host Mark
flavor: Genial old Holborn led a group of Guardians on several risky expeditions to Mars.

name: Honor of Cormorant
flavor: One of the remaining sashes of the Cormorant, torn in battle by a forgotten foe.

name: Immanent War Mark
flavor: The subtlest of wars still leave their marks.

name: Impervious Mark
flavor: "It was not a significant bullet."

name: Infinite Lines Mark
flavor: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Iron Camelot Mark
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Radegast, he who was first among the peers of the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan Mark
flavor: Slow and steady wins the race.

name: Jolder's Iron Sash
flavor: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: Choose your words and sigils well, for they are your remembering.

name: Kallipolis Mark
flavor: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

name: Kell's Mark
flavor: Be feared.

name: Kings' Mark
flavor: Take the throne.

name: Light of the Great Prism
flavor: "When the long dark closes around us, we will be the last light." - Wei Ning

name: Lightning Mark
flavor: "The sun low in the sky, the wind in your hair, your enemies piled at your feet. Perfection."

name: Mark of a Kellslayer
flavor: "See this mark and know: by my hands a Kell has fallen."

name: Mark of Bluster
flavor: "The Blustery Brew" is a favorite City tavern amongst Titans.

name: Mark of Chaos
flavor: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

name: Mark of Command
flavor: "A successful defense prolongs a war. A successful attack ends it."

name: Mark of Contention
flavor: The mighty Thalor was invincible in the Crucible - until Dredgen Yor, and his Thorn.

name: Mark of Desolation
flavor: Did that shadow just move?

name: Mark of Diligence
flavor: Titan armor is crafted by legion members, not the City's foundries. Every would-be smith proves themselves on Fieldplate.

name: Mark of Discipline
flavor: Novice Titans are expected to adapt to their new lives with discipline and determination.

name: Mark of Favor
flavor: City communities work together to produce these marks as gifts for their champions.

name: Mark of Fortitude
flavor: Some historians mark the rise of Fieldplate as the moment the Titan orders found their footing.

name: Mark of Fortune
flavor: "I would trust it to thee if it were silver; I would give it even if it were gold." - the Edda

name: Mark of Fury
flavor: "We can wait here until the Traveler falls! Or we can go out there and kill them!" - from a doctrinal dispute

name: Mark of History
flavor: Titan marks are worn to honor the history of individuals or entire orders.

name: Mark of Jagi's Host
flavor: Jagi's Host was last seen marching south of the Cosmodrome, toward the shores of the Caspian Sea.

name: Mark of Lost Charge
flavor: A zealous few sneer at the legend of Six Fronts. Our invincible defense was a waste, they say. We should have charged.

name: Mark of Mourning
flavor: Some Guardians have a hard time relating to the rest of the City. Others know their struggles all too well.

name: Mark of No Tomorrow
flavor: Passion and patience in equal measure will open the unlimited way.

name: Mark of Oblivion
flavor: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

name: Mark of Passage
flavor: Within the walls, weary wanderers can find rest.

name: Mark of Renown
flavor: Robust and flexible, the iconic Fieldplate pattern has served every Titan order.

name: Mark of Resolve
flavor: "You cannot control the enemy. You can control yourself. The real victory lies within." - Pujari, Transcript VII

name: Mark of Sacrifice
flavor: Sometimes the mark will tangle in the armor. Shred it without hesitation. It, too, is prepared to sacrifice.

name: Mark of Thunder
flavor: "What is the power of the lightning without the roar of the thunder?" —Wei Ning

name: Mark of Unity
flavor: The Six Fronts, perhaps the most recognizable element used in Titan marks, memorializes a mighty stand.

name: Mark of Wings
flavor: News travels fast in the City.

name: Mark of the Anchor
flavor: Titan orders are often accused of dour fatalism. But there are those who celebrate all they protect.

name: Mark of the Arena
flavor: City dwellers often sport totems and tunics denoting their favorite Crucible combatants and teams.

name: Mark of the Beacon
flavor: "A singer came to me, saying, 'You protect me, and I do nothing in return.' I told him to sing, and he understood." - Saint-14

name: Mark of the Bulwarks
flavor: "War upon stone and it grows weaker. War upon man and he grows stronger. Which shall your wall be built of?"

name: Mark of the Chain
flavor: Even at Six Fronts, the City's darkest hour, some Titans broke orders, but the Chain prevailed.

name: Mark of the Chosen
flavor: "Your Light drives your armor. Do not speak of yourself as separate from the plate." - Pujari, Transcript XV

name: Mark of the Circle
flavor: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

name: Mark of the Conqueror
flavor: "THE LAST AND SUREST ARGUMENT" - traditional inscription for the right gauntlet, attributed to Wei Ning

name: Mark of the Dauntless
flavor: "Yes, we've achieved the objective. And the next. And the…were we supposed to stop attacking?" —Wei Ning

name: Mark of the Devils
flavor: "I seek no worship, only war."

name: Mark of the Duskborn
flavor: "We called her Verok; it was her and her Thrall that finally overwhelmed him." - Eris

name: Mark of the Embattled
flavor: Marks are worn low on the body to avoid interfering with a Titan's arms or weapons. They still see wear.

name: Mark of the Executor
flavor: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

name: Mark of the Exile
flavor: "Though the City won a great battle at Twilight Gap, it lost an even greater mind." —Sister Lupe

name: Mark of the Exodus
flavor: The stars are calling.

name: Mark of the Far-Flung
flavor: Every Guardian's first act is to defend a home they have not yet known.

name: Mark of the First Pillar
flavor: Titans train to fight on dangerous ground, a first line of defense against any crisis.

name: Mark of the Fortress
flavor: Fortresses do not wait silently for war. They are schools, trading posts, monuments. Vessels for life.

name: Mark of the Gatekeepers
flavor: The Pilgrim Guard was the first Titan order, formed to protect refugees entering the fledgling Last City.

name: Mark of the Hidden
flavor: "And with the lone strength of the Titan Vell Tarlowe, we felt invincible." - Eris

name: Mark of the Initiative
flavor: Speak with the voice of the people, or prepare to face them.

name: Mark of the Keeper
flavor: When there is turmoil in the City, cool-headed Titans often help restore the peace. Sometimes it costs them.

name: Mark of the Kings
flavor: "No beast lords over Earth."

name: Mark of the Lost
flavor: Every Titan's individual legend could inspire a new lineage of marks.

name: Mark of the Lost Seven
flavor: One by one, the Ghosts of Jagi's Host returned to the City. If they knew of their Guardians' fates, they would not reveal it.

name: Mark of the Martyred
flavor: It is called the Firebreak Calculus: how much good could I do if I find the right place and fight until I die?

name: Mark of the New Front
flavor: The Firebreak orders strive to draw the battle away from the City and its interests.

name: Mark of the New Sun
flavor: "He loosens all bonds." - the Lokasenna

name: Mark of the Oasis
flavor: A Titan in the field is better than an oasis in the desert.

name: Mark of the Old Challenge
flavor: By their rules must you win, or not at all.

name: Mark of the Order
flavor: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

name: Mark of the Pariah
flavor: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Mark of the Pilgrim Guard
flavor: Legend holds that Titans stood in defense of the first pilgrims to gather below the Traveler.

name: Mark of the Pit
flavor: Torn from a vanquished Wizard, it flutters in windless air.

name: Mark of the Protector
flavor: The first Titans led survivors to the safety of the City.

name: Mark of the Queen's Guard
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Mark of the Risen
flavor: A Titan's mark declares deeds and influences. Your Ghost scrounged this cloth together. It's a start.

name: Mark of the Rising
flavor: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

name: Mark of the Sentry
flavor: The City's enemies often use airmobile tactics. Some Titans train for rapid response to these landings.

name: Mark of the Six Fronts
flavor: Four orders of Titans held six approaches in the first great battle around the Last City, and not one front broke.

name: Mark of the Sojourn
flavor: Our will is such that we find strength in the gaze of Death itself.

name: Mark of the Sortie
flavor: At Six Fronts, two Firebreak commanders led a sortie beyond the walls. They reclaimed five miles of scorched land from the Fallen.

name: Mark of the Spawn
flavor: "It's not an Acolyte's loin cloth, it's the spoils of war." - Vell Tarlowe

name: Mark of the Stoneborn
flavor: "They don't fail." - Commander Zavala, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

name: Mark of the Sunforged
flavor: "Of all the Lights, we burned the brightest." —Unknown Sunbreaker

name: Mark of the Supreme
flavor: Titan lore memorializes the greatest warriors of humanity's past.

name: Mark of the Undying Mind
flavor: The Black Garden grows in both directions.

name: Mark of the Wall
flavor: "We have one city. One final chance. There are no forgivable errors. Be ceaseless in your vigilance."

name: Mark of the War Tides
flavor: "At the doom of Men he will return home among the wise Vanir." - the Edda

name: Mark of the Watcher
flavor: "The mark's just pretty cloth. What matters is what it stands for." - Pujari, Transcript IX

name: Mark of the Witness
flavor: "Fighting your enemy helps you understand your enemy. Don't get distracted." —Zavala

name: Mark of the Wolves
flavor: "I am the leader of the pack."

name: Moctezuma-Polyphonic
flavor: A mark of unity which celebrates the equality of all under the protection of the Traveler.

name: NOYB Mark
flavor: "One day in the Crucible tells you everything you need to know about a Guardian. Even yourself." - Thalor

name: Old Man's Mark
flavor: "Sometimes, I wish my Ghost had picked someone else."

name: Order of the Lost Saint
flavor: "His Light cast no shadows."- Paean to Saint-14

name: Pandion Mark
flavor: “Glory in the Crucible—that is the truest immortality a Guardian can attain.” —Thalor

name: Pioneer Mark
flavor: These marks recall the flags that waved over the first Venus colonies.

name: Racer's Mark
flavor: Your enemies will see the signs of your approach. They will not be able to stop you.

name: Radegast's Iron Sash
flavor: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

name: Season of Ages XII
flavor: A warbanner marking the twelfth era of the Titan orders.

name: Silimar's Iron Sash
flavor: Ward or fist, you cannot be broken.

name: Spektar Heliopause Mark
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Spektar Infinite Mark
flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Spektar Kallipolis Mark
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Spektar Pandion Mark
flavor: "Glory in the Crucible—that is the truest immortality a Guardian can attain." —Thalor

name: Spektar's Mark
flavor: The heat shimmers off the shield, refracting into broken rainbows.

name: Spirit of Saturn
flavor: A ceremonial badge worn by Titans in memory of the lost First Fleet.

name: Striker's Mark
flavor: "It's what we do. It's as natural as breathing." —Holborn

name: Sublime Light Mark
flavor: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

name: Sunbreaker's Mark
flavor: Once, these marks streamed proudly from the City's rooftops. Now, they are a symbol of defiance.

name: Tarlowe Mark
flavor: "The stalwart heart of the team. May his Light find its rest." —Eris Morn

name: Thalor's Golden Maul
flavor: The legendary mark of Thalor, a victor in the Crucible.

name: War Numen's Mark
flavor: Will you barter your soul in exchange for the chance to kill a king?

name: Wolfswood Mark
flavor: And beneath its branches, the Iron Wolves forged an unbreakable oath.

name: Year 1993
flavor: A pattern made famous by the restoration of ancient Golden Age tomes.

name: Atheon Mask
flavor: "It's about time!" —Fenchurch Everis

name: Crota Mask
flavor: "Don this monster's face to hide the monsters lurking behind your own." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Cryptarch Mask
flavor: "I myself frequently don the guise of my old friend Rahool in order to enter the Tower unremarked." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Eris Morn Mask
flavor: There's something very disturbing about this mask.

name: Exotic Engram Mask
flavor: "That's an 'exotic' look, Guardian." —Tess Everis

name: Legendary Engram Mask
flavor: "Yes, it's true—the Legendary Engram was named after me." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Oryx Mask
flavor: I am the Taken King!

name: Petra Venj Mask
flavor: The Queen's Wrath is beautiful and terrible to behold.

name: Rare Engram Mask
flavor: "To be a Guardian is to be part of a rarefied company of heroes." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Skolas Mask
flavor: The Kell of Kells.

name: Skull Mask
flavor: Festival of the Lost 2015 You have risen from eternal night to haunt the dreams of your enemies.

name: Speaker Mask
flavor: "In my travels I have learned that speaking is much easier than listening." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Tiger Mask
flavor: "In the Vex's time conflux I befriended a being with this striking visage. He was noble, brave, and bestial." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Traveler Mask
flavor: "Such simplicity. Such contours! Been inside the Traveler, you know. Smells faintly of vanilla." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Uncommon Engram Mask
flavor: "I see that you and I have 'common' interests, Guardian." —Fenchurch Everis

name: Warden Mask
flavor: "You mock me, Guardian?" —Variks

name: Xûr Mask
flavor: "Even with all my lengthy travels, my knowledge has limits. Ah, do keep that quiet." —Fenchurch Everis

name: 123 Syzygy
flavor: All in a row.

name: 55A-allFATE
flavor: To each a purpose, and to all a fitting end.

name: Aegis of the Kell
flavor: For this judgment, there is no protection.

name: Aegis of the Kell II
flavor: For this judgment, there is no protection.

name: Aegis of the Reef
flavor: Protect the borders. Punish the unjust.

name: Anomie MSm
flavor: Is lawlessness the natural state of the universe?

name: Antapex MSc
flavor: Which reality, but for the one we enact upon ourselves and others?

name: Apple of Discord
flavor: "For the fairest."

name: Bad Juju
flavor: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." - Toland the Shattered

name: Bad Seed Down
flavor: A manufacturing defect cracked the frame and fused its systems – and somehow made it deadlier.

name: Baryon MSc
flavor: Microbays for tactical systems enhance an already potent precision pulse rifle.

name: Black SUROS SWB-42
flavor: A lightweight and snappy Suros pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Catena MSc
flavor: A light, responsive weapon with attachment points for unorthodox systems modules.

name: Coiled Hiss
flavor: Watch your step.

name: Cold Current
flavor: "There's something dark out beyond the Reef. I can feel it in the void…"

name: Corona MSc
flavor: Light the path. And when all else fails... aim for the head.

name: CRACKERJACK.BETA
flavor: Not liable for damage or disability caused by prototype performance.

name: Dead Air 09F3
flavor: The recoil-cushioning cytogel, left to grow, has fused into a primitive neural network.

name: Echo 33
flavor: "Negative. We will hold until overrun. Echo 3-3, signing off."

name: Evergreen II.I
flavor: Hope springs eternal.

name: Fair and Square
flavor: A formidable burst-fire, precision rifle, custom-rigged for Crucible combat. Scrupulously devoted to fair play.

name: Final Duty
flavor: Created for Paladin Hallam Fen in honor of his efforts at the fortress on Cybele.

name: Grasp of Malok
flavor: "Dutiful Malok. Many offerings of Light did he make at the Shrines of Oryx." —Eris Morn

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Make precision shots with this weapon to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Harrowed Smite of Merain
flavor: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

name: Hawksaw
flavor: A northwesterly wind is blowing.

name: Herja-D
flavor: Devastate your foes with the deadly precision of the Häkke Herja-D.

name: Hopscotch Pilgrim
flavor: It's a long road. Enjoy it.

name: Hotspur-A
flavor: Piezopolymer paneling makes the Häkke Hotspur-A a balanced war machine.

name: Hydrus
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the water snake of the night sky.

name: KAU8 Constellation Scar
flavor: Constellations are an artifact of perspective.

name: Lump Distribution
flavor: This nimble rifle's on-board tactical systems keep a scrupulous tally of combat stats.

name: Lyudmila-D
flavor: The cold sharpshooter's precision of the Häkke Lyudmila-D is a marvel to behold.

name: Moriaen-D
flavor: You are a child of many cultures, a protector of all peoples.

name: New Heart LDD
flavor: Clear!

name: Nirwen's Mercy
flavor: A burst-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: No Time To Explain
flavor: A single word is etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: "Soon."

name: Occulate MSc
flavor: Where does the cloaking Darkness end?

name: Oversoul Edict
flavor: The light of the will of Crota shines down like a vast and inverse sun.

name: Painted Apollo MSc
flavor: A highly accurate Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Painted Neptune MSc
flavor: A high-velocity Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Painted SUROS BZL-45
flavor: A precision Suros pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Payment VI
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Payment VI
flavor: Paladin Hallam Fen commissioned this weapon in memory of his mentor, Paladin Imogen Rife.

name: Praedyth's Timepiece
flavor: "He skipped like a stone on time's ocean. This is what's left." - Unknown

name: Primed Starfall MSc
flavor: A tactically flexible Nadir pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Psi Alba IV
flavor: This power has always existed. Only our understanding is new.

name: Psi Alto III
flavor: This weapon's power comes from the strength of its wielder's will.

name: Psi Lento III
flavor: The journey to enlightenment is slow, but rewarding.

name: Psi Tempus II
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Psi Tempus variant is a flexible multirole design.

name: Psi Tempus III
flavor: Multirole weapon. Fire control system can double as an NLS drive regulator, if you don't mind a gun flying your ship.

name: Psi Umbra I
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Psi Umbra variant is a common example, accurized for long-range work.

name: Psi Umbra II
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The Psi Umbra II is a retooled precision weapon for long-range kills.

name: Psi Umbra II-A
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Umbra II-A variant is a flexible multirole design.

name: Psi Volo II
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The flat-topped bullpup Psi Volo is a snappy, featherweight design.

name: Psi Volo III
flavor: The Psi Volo's ergonomics and mass have been rigorously optimized for fast response.

name: Pulsar MSe
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The MSe is a close-quarters design, cut down for easy handling.

name: Pulsar MSm
flavor: The compact MSm handles very nimbly. Some Ghosts claim the onboard electronics are slightly intoxicating.

name: Raskova-A
flavor: The terror of the night. The strike from the shadows.

name: Red Death
flavor: Vanguard policy urges Guardians to destroy this weapon on sight.

name: Reflection Sum
flavor: How to count the infinities?

name: Reflection Sum (Adept)
flavor: How to count the infinities?

name: Silvered Continuum MSc
flavor: A tactically flexible Nadir pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Silvered Procyon MSc
flavor: A burst-fire Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Skorri's Revenge
flavor: A burst-fire weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Smite of Merain
flavor: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

name: Spare Change.25
flavor: Keep it.

name: Strange Suspect
flavor: Certainly not one of the usual suspects.

name: Super Pox VLO
flavor: Found in a null-g hangar, drifting alongside fourteen limbless and decapitated Fallen corpses.

name: SUROS BNS-13
flavor: A reliable but lightweight weapon, the Suros BNS-13 also has a flexible layout.

name: SUROS JPS-20
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The JPS-20 is a smooth extension of the shooter, perfect for long-range fire.

name: SUROS JPS-32
flavor: The JPS-32 provides precision burst fire. Integrated micromotors control the barrel's harmonic resonance.

name: SUROS JPS-55
flavor: Smooth in the hand and precise on fire, the JPS-55 will illustrate your point quite nicely.

name: SUROS MIN-15
flavor: Balanced. Moderate. High-impact. SUROS.

name: SUROS PDX-41
flavor: Ergonomic. Autonomic. Animatronic. SUROS.

name: SUROS PDX-45
flavor: Lightweight. Snappy. Reflexive. SUROS.

name: SUROS PRI-44
flavor: Lightweight. Powerful. Modular. SUROS.

name: SUROS TSP-10
flavor: Suros prototype. Use against Vex targets to gather field data for the Suros research department.

name: Temporal MSm
flavor: Can the past ever be undone? Can the future ever be attained?

name: The Conduit
flavor: A burst-fire weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Messenger
flavor: From deep within the shadows it came—a messenger borne on black wings.

name: The Messenger (Adept)
flavor: An elite trophy earned only by Trials of Osiris champions.

name: The Ninth Edict
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: The Stranger's Rifle
flavor: Ghost's analysis suggests this weapon has been exposed to incredible forces…and that parts of it shouldn't yet exist.

name: The Villainy
flavor: A burst-fire weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: Three Little Words
flavor: It's not enough to say them. You've got to MEAN them.

name: Time On Target
flavor: Three rounds rapid.

name: TKO (First Round)
flavor: Down and out.

name: Trifecta S.2
flavor: An accurized Vanguard-issue pulse rifle, stripped and rebuilt with tight tolerances for long-range accuracy.

name: Admonisher III
flavor: Executor-issued rocket launcher for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Affentheater C/L-A
flavor: Our enemies watch us huddle and just laugh. But it's our show now.

name: Baron RS/1
flavor: Shoulder-fired devastation. The Baron is a general-purpose unguided explosive launcher.

name: Baron RS/2
flavor: Shoulder-fired devastation. The Baron is a general-purpose launcher; this one bears the inscription 'FULL STOP' on the trigger guard.

name: Baron RS/2a
flavor: Shoulder-fired devastation. The Baron RS/2a is a general-purpose launcher that was used as a testbed for later development.

name: Big Rig XXL
flavor: This is my truck.

name: Bishop RS/5
flavor: The study of Golden Age relics has given birth to fearsome, adaptable weapons.

name: Breaker SA/2
flavor: Shoulder-mounted devastation. Like its cousin the Butcher, the Breaker puts raw damage first.

name: Breaker SA/3
flavor: The SA/3 Breaker answers a requirement for a hard-hitting launcher to defeat new varieties of Fallen armor.

name: Butcher SA/2
flavor: Shoulder-mounted devastation. The Butcher's heavy payload delivers catastrophic damage.

name: Butcher SA/3
flavor: Heavy damage. To the point. Caution is advised. Enjoy.

name: Ceres Lost BMJ-46
flavor: A rocket launcher, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Chamberlain SA/5
flavor: A high-end general-purpose launcher, built for Guardians to re-rig in the field.

name: Choleric Dragon SRT-49
flavor: What you'd call a 'fiery' personality.

name: Crown Prince SA/3
flavor: A well-rounded, high-end launcher, eager to follow its monarch into battle.

name: Crown Princess SA/3
flavor: A flexible, responsive launcher, ready to take its rightful place.

name: Dauphin RS/1

flavor: A refurbished blockade runner, customized with the Fallen House of Wolves' sigil, given as a trophy to those who brave the Prison of Elders.

name: Agnes III
flavor: Old Agnes says that this is no world for half measures.

name: Antimuon ESc
flavor: Can not the smallest particle menace the greatest warrior?

name: Arcana ESc
flavor: Could anyone even claim to know the questions…or all the answers?

name: Baryonic ESm
flavor: What mysteries lie in the smallest shards of reality?

name: Binary Dawn
flavor: "One day you will see them both." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Black Chasma ESc
flavor: A lightweight and snappy Nadir shotgun, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Bronzed Chasma ESc
flavor: A brute force Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Burden of Proof XI
flavor: Executor-issued shotgun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Cepheid ESm
flavor: What strange discoveries lie beyond our orbit?

name: Chasma Esc
flavor: The ESc's blunt exterior conceals a superb multirole shotgun with multiple systems bays.

name: Conspiracy Theory-D
flavor: You're not paranoid if there really is a monolithic embodiment of pure evil out to get you.

name: Copperhead Mk. 32
flavor: The heavy-load Mk. 32 provides the punctuation mark at the end of a lot of lives.

name: Crash Casket 81
flavor: Press here to fill shallow graves.

name: Cúchulainn-D
flavor: You may die, but you will die on your feet, facing your enemies.

name: Deadlander Mk. 24
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Deadlander pays its way in hurt - overpacked shells deal excellent damage.

name: Ded Alia III
flavor: Challenge every reality. There is always another way.

name: Ded Hexia IV
flavor: A pox upon your enemies.

name: Ded Laurea IV
flavor: An instrument for turning thoughts and wills into realities.

name: Ded Regnum III
flavor: Your own mind must be your first conquest. Do not let it be your last.

name: Ded Venefici I
flavor: In Dark hearts, your Light is a righteous poison.

name: Deidris's Retort
flavor: A brute-force weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Dido-A
flavor: Wanderer, your journey will end with victory.

name: Double Nickel
flavor: A blunt reminder that this particular room belongs to you.

name: Dry Rot 32
flavor: Custom-rigged hole puncher.

name: Felwinter's Lie
flavor: close quarters weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Found Verdict
flavor: Witness.

name: Graviton ESe
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. A cut-down holdout weapon, the Graviton is easy to ready and aim.

name: Graviton ESm
flavor: A novice Guardian fought off a horde of Dreg with wit, reflexes, and this lightweight shotgun.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Use against Hive targets to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Hard Luck Charm
flavor: Luck is a four-letter word.

name: Harrowed Silence of A'arn
flavor: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

name: Her Champion
flavor: Raise a hand against her, and we will raise ours in return.

name: Her Courtesy
flavor: Etiquette is a powerful weapon.

name: Her Eyes
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Her Unspoken Will
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Hide and Seek-42
flavor: A close-quarters modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: I PROTEST
flavor: It's DISGRACEFUL!

name: Immobius
flavor: As long as you can't move me, I can't be moved.

name: Impulse Esc
flavor: Rumor says the Fallen call it the Ambition Maul, for all the proud Captains it has humbled.

name: In Times of Need
flavor: In case of emergency, point at enemies and pull trigger. Repeat as necessary.

name: Invective
flavor: "I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my Ghost. After that it was a short conversation." - Ikora Rey

name: Invisible Hand M7
flavor: Built so light, it sometimes feels like it's not even there.

name: Jingukogo-D
flavor: The Häkke Jingukogo-D is a balanced weapon, built for conquest.

name: Judgment VI
flavor: Executor-issued close quarters weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: LOCKJAW
flavor: Leave them speechless.

name: Lord of Wolves
flavor: "By this right alone do I rule."

name: Matador 64
flavor: Be the bull.

name: Outlander Mk. 26
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Outlander's ominous maw speaks truth - it deals exemplary damage for its class.

name: Outlander Mk. 38
flavor: A mad spitter, tuned for nothing but suffering.

name: Party Crasher +1
flavor: I said INVITE ONLY!

name: Patch-A
flavor: A shotgun, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Preacher Mk. 11
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Preacher only knows one sermon. It's pretty good, though.

name: Preacher Mk. 20
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Preacher sets a mind at peace.

name: Preacher Mk. 22
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The Preacher's always there when you need her.

name: Rude Awakening DOA
flavor: High-impact firepower modified to fit the exacting specifications of Dead Orbit's expanding arsenal.

name: Sagitta
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the arrow of the night sky.

name: Secret Handshake
flavor: Redacted.

name: SG-Scattercast
flavor: A Vanguard-issue shotgun, thoroughly tested and completely reliable.

name: Sidewinder Mk.53
flavor: Nimble and aggressive, the Mk.53 has a vicious bite.

name: Silence of A'arn
flavor: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

name: Stolen Will
flavor: "Our enemies have taken much from us. We will steal everything from them." —Petra Venj

name: Strongbow-D
flavor: The bloodthirsty Häkke Strongbow-D is a weapon fit for a conqueror.

name: SUROS MKB-21
flavor: The perfect close-quarters tool. The MKB-21 is a flexible tactical shotgun commonly used by the City's internal patrols.

name: SUROS MKB-33
flavor: A tactical upgrade to the MKB multirole shotgun line. Handy for close encounters.

name: SUROS MKB-51
flavor: Built for support, the multirole MKB-51 cuts through tough situations.

name: Swordbreaker
flavor: If you're going to face down a Knight with an ascendant blade, bring an ascendant gun.

name: The 4th Horseman
flavor: It's not a holdout weapon, it's a pathfinder.

name: The Chaperone
flavor: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there, before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

name: The Comedian
flavor: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: The Crash
flavor: A close quarters weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Next Big Thing
flavor: Actually, I'm already pretty famous on Mars, so...."

name: Two for the Road
flavor: The rail-assisted firing mechanism provides ferocious punch. External cables armored for durability.

name: Two To The Morgue
flavor: You know the old saying…

name: Universal Remote
flavor: To the untrained eye this beast is a junker. To the trained eye, however, this junker…is a beast.

name: Vector Esc
flavor: This weapon revels in savage close-quarters combat.

name: Wolfborne Oath
flavor: "In the pack leader we trust."

name: Antandre-D
flavor: One of the Twelve lives on in your hand.

name: Chilonis-A
flavor: Surrender is not an option.

name: Conviction II
flavor: Executor-issued sidearm for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Crow's Eye
flavor: I see many things. Hear more. Judge all." —Variks

name: Dreg's Promise
flavor: "I am a marvel with ten thousand arms."

name: Havoc Pigeon
flavor: Who knew such a tiny thing could cause so much trouble?

name: Hawkwood-A
flavor: Quick on the draw, the Häkke Hawkwood-A is your all-purpose escape plan.

name: Ironwreath-D
flavor: A versatile sidearm, forged by Häkke for the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: JabberHäkke-D
flavor: Beware, my gun!

name: Lamorak-A
flavor: What you want, you will have.

name: Llefelys-D
flavor: You don't have a problem. You have solutions.

name: Penthesilea-C
flavor: Seek out battle wherever it may be.

name: Pryderi-D
flavor: Long will the poets sing of your deeds.

name: Queen's Choice
flavor: Presented to Her Majesty Mara Sov by her loving subjects.

name: Rustam-D
flavor: Your labors for the City will not be forgotten.

name: Sagramore-A
flavor: For the warrior who is desirous of victory.

name: Thalestris-C
flavor: Rule the battlefield with the quick-fire Häkke Thalestris-C.

name: Vesosis-C
flavor: This war is long, but it can't last forever.

name: Vestian Dynasty
flavor: A Reef scout hunts for years—fighting piracy and ancient traps—to crack one cache and claim the weapons within.

name: Vortigern-C
flavor: Forge your dynasty.

name: 1000-Yard Stare
flavor: You can see everything. You can unsee nothing.

name: 13098v Incognito
flavor: A flexible Vanguard-issue sniper rifle that uses nanolathed components to improve design tolerances.

name: 20/20 AMR7
flavor: Take in the sights.

name: Allowance V/C4
flavor: Match-grade sniper weapon. A scalpel for the steady-handed.

name: Amina-E7
flavor: In a Guardian's hands, a properly equipped precision rifle can gain uncanny capabilities.

name: Amplified Geo-D6
flavor: Shortest distance between two points across a curved visual axis: Aim + Squeeze.

name: Andacht 81
flavor: The booming report of the Andacht coined the phrase 'Wall thunder'.

name: Antinomy XVI
flavor: Executor-issued sniper rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Aoife Rua-D
flavor: Control the battlefield with the Häkke Aoife Rua-D.

name: Ascalon-LR1
flavor: Tall walls. Gleaming temples. Kings and queens with glittering eyes.

name: Avenue A
flavor: Looks like that poor fellow took a wrong turn.

name: Black Hammer
flavor: "I cannot permit you to exist."

name: Black Spindle
flavor: "Your only existence shall be that which I weave for you out of sorrow and woe."

name: Black Trung-D
flavor: A long range Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Broken Truth-LR1
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Calcutta-LR1
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The LR1 is a flexible weapon with excellent tolerance for wear.

name: Calcutta-LR2
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The Calcutta series hails from a lineage that once guarded the City's wall-builders.

name: Calcutta-LR2a
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The LR2a has an integrated com set, but a Guardian's Ghost renders it redundant.

name: Candace-B
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. named for the designer, Candace throws a massive antipersonnel round.

name: Caracas-LR5
flavor: Enjoy the view, while waging war from a comfortable distance.

name: Chandragupta-A
flavor: You can't be stopped. You won't be forgotten.

name: Civilian Applications
flavor: None found.

name: Defiance of Yasmin
flavor: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

name: Deianeira-D
flavor: They underestimate you at their own peril.

name: Doom Echo XI
flavor: The name is not hyperbole.

name: Efideet's Spear
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Eirene RR4
flavor: A new Golden Age is just over the horizon. With the Omolon Eirene RR4, you'll be the first to see it coming.

name: Epitaph 2261
flavor: It's seen things you people wouldn't believe. Killed most of them, too.

name: Equiprobable LSc
flavor: If not here, could it not be elsewhere?

name: Eumolpias-SR3
flavor: Long roads. Sloping hills. Ancient roots. Keep the watch.

name: Extrasolar RR4
flavor: A sniper rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Eye of Sol
flavor: "The sun took my sight, thus the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

name: FINAL BOSS
flavor: Become the monster.

name: Glass Promontory
flavor: It is not the height of the cliff, but the struggle of the climb that clears my eyes.

name: Gozen-C
flavor: The massive Gozen-C fires a brutally powerful iridium sabot.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Use against Cabal Centurions to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Harrowed Defiance of Yasmin
flavor: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

name: Her Benevolence
flavor: A weapon carried by the Vestian Guard, the body which patrols the Reef's borders.

name: Her Fury
flavor: A weapon carried by the Vestian Guard in their fight against the Taken.

name: Hereafter
flavor: "Huddled at the mountain's base, we had no choice but to beat our ploughshares into swords once more."

name: Hieracon-LR2
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The Hieracon-LR2 is a flexible marksman platform designed for all conditions.

name: Hieracon-LR3
flavor: The multirole Hieracon is an effective generalist sniper weapon. Scope mounts may stick in cold.

name: Hieracon-LR5
flavor: Guardians eschew the weapon's bipod - a tool for those without preternatural gifts of war.

name: Ice Breaker
flavor: Please replace these components if use causes fatal damage: HEAT SINK. MAGAZINE. OPERATOR

name: Known Horizon
flavor: If you can see it, you can kill it.

name: LDR 5001
flavor: Ballistic heartbreak.

name: Low-Grade Humility
flavor: "I'm good at this."

name: Luna Chiral III
flavor: In all of us, two natures dwell.

name: Luna Phasar III
flavor: Be the shear. Unstitch a foe molecule by molecule.

name: Luna Vallar IV
flavor: A precise whisper is more powerful than an echoing scream.

name: Matuta RR4
flavor: Bring forth the dawn.

name: Neutrino LSm
flavor: Can anything stop you?

name: No Land Beyond
flavor: Every hit blazes the path to our reclamation.

name: Omolon Test RR1
flavor: Omolon prototype. Use against Fallen Captains to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

name: Painted Sammuramat-C
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke sniper rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Patience and Time
flavor: If you've got it, they'll never see it coming.

name: Pompeii-LR2
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The Pompeii-LR2 is an accurized Hieracon variant for long-range shots.

name: Pompeii-LR3
flavor: An accurized sniper rifle named for the site of an ancient disaster.

name: Pompeii-LR5
flavor: Extinction never felt so good.

name: Praedyth's Revenge
flavor: Praedyth's fall isn't over… because it hasn't happened yet… and it will happen again.

name: Prudence II
flavor: Executor-issued sharpshooter's weapon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Saigon-LR5
flavor: Carefully balanced capabilities, a bristling array of extended systems, and a deadly calm.

name: Scipio-E
flavor: The Scipio-Echo is a portable lesson in the meaning of 'ballistic trauma'.

name: Shadow of Veils
flavor: Judgment on the unseen is best performed from a distance.

name: Silvered Boudicca-D
flavor: A powerful Häkke sniper rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Silvered Caracas-LR4
flavor: A highly accurate Daito sniper rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Silvered Mulan-D
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Stillpiercer
flavor: By the time they know you're there, it's already too late.

name: Subtle Nudge DN7
flavor: With the right touch, they all fall down.

name: SUROS JLL-19
flavor: Lightweight. Precise. Modular. SUROS.

name: Tamar-D
flavor: With the Häkke Tamar-D, they'll never see you coming.

name: Tao Hua Yuan
flavor: One day, the flowers will grow again.

name: The Chosen
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Majestic
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: The Supremacy
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Tomyris-E2
flavor: "If my rifle gets any smarter I'm afraid I'll fall for her." - Anahera-3, Exo hunter

name: Trajan-B
flavor: Engage and defeat the enemy at extreme range. The long-barrel Trajan Bravo offers good accuracy.

name: Trajan-C
flavor: Accurized long-barrel sniper weapon. Often arrives with unusual onboard systems.

name: Uzume RR4
flavor: With the Uzume RR4 on your side, the Darkness doesn't stand a chance.

name: Violator XII
flavor: Executor-issued sharpshooter's weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Vulpecula
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the little fox of the night sky.

name: Weyloran's March
flavor: A sharpshooter's weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Y-09 Longbow Synthesis
flavor: Closer Than You Think

name: Zen Meteor
flavor: Complete awareness, complete focus. A mind sharpened by diligence to a single deadly point.

name: Days of Wind
flavor: "Awoken grieve for Kell-Queen. I grieve too… but grieve with open eyes. Do you know what I see?" —Variks

name: EV-30 Tumbler
flavor: It takes a skilled field mechanic to disable limiters without destabilizing the entire drive.

name: EV-31 Nightbird
flavor: Drive fast and take risks.

name: EV-32 Snowblind
flavor: In modifying field drives, the limiting factor is tolerance to the possibility of explosive disassembly.

name: EV-33 Dragonrider
flavor: At some point, it will come down to how tightly you can hold on.

name: EV-34 Vector Infinite
flavor: Reserved for mentor Guardians who initiate others into the mysteries of the Light.

name: EV-35 Arcrunner
flavor: Those who seek to bind the lightning may find themselves consumed by it instead.

name: EV-36 Solscout
flavor: The power of the sun harnessed for use by the bravest of warriors.

name: EV-37 Voidstreak
flavor: Fueled by the Void.

name: EV-38 Laurelbearer
flavor: There are many who seek victory. Few will wear the laurel.

name: EV-39 Lumos
flavor: The rose turns toward the sun, but its roots grow deep in Darkness.

name: EV-40 Snowscream
flavor: The fool may not fear the storm, but the storm will never respect a fool.

name: EV-41 Momentum Master
flavor: To the victor goes the prize.

name: EV-42 Nightsteed
flavor: Every hero requires a trusty mount.

name: EV-43 Lightrunner
flavor: Night falls, but your eyes are turned toward the dawn.

name: S-10
flavor: Quick on the ground and small enough for transmat deployment.

name: S-10v
flavor: The Vanguard prizes its Sparrows, which are invaluable for recon and quick deployment.

name: S-11
flavor: A tuned-up vector drive gives this Sparrow a bit more spring in its step.

name: S-13 "Graverobber"
flavor: There are many who seek to cheat death, but so few capable of outrunning its dark embrace.

name: S-20 Cavalier
flavor: The Series-20 Cavalier is a Titan mainstay, more robust and reliable than the baseline Sparrow.

name: S-20 Nomad
flavor: Hunters have a reputation for technical savvy. The S-20 Nomad highlights that expertise.

name: S-20 Seeker
flavor: Warlocks devised the Series-20 Seeker variant of the Sparrow for their own arcane purposes.

name: S-21 Cavalier
flavor: Titans tune their thrust bikes to handle the burden of heavy armor.

name: S-21 Nomad
flavor: On foot or by thrust bike, Hunters carve new trails through the frontier.

name: S-21 Seeker
flavor: Careful attention to the Seeker's shielding reduces field interference.

name: S-22 Cavalier
flavor: The Series-22 Cavalier helps put Titans right where they belong--in the thick of the battle.

name: S-22 Nomad
flavor: The Series-22 Nomad helps Hunters stalk swift prey.

name: S-22 Seeker
flavor: The Series-22 Seeker answers the esoteric needs of elite Warlocks.

name: S-30C (Emerald)
flavor: This S-30C's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-30C (Plasma)
flavor: This S-30C's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-30C (Stealth)
flavor: This S-30C's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-30C (Void)
flavor: This S-30C's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-30C Phoenix
flavor: The coveted S-30C Phoenix is reserved for Guardians who demonstrate exceptional resolve.

name: S-30V
flavor: The Vanguard reserves the Series-30 Sparrow for the most successful Guardians.

flavor: This S-30V's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

flavor: This S-30V's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

flavor: This S-30V's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

flavor: This S-30V's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

flavor: This variant of the coveted Phoenix has an improved powerplant.

name: S-31V
flavor: The Series-31V sports an improved powerplant.

flavor: This S-31V's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

flavor: This S-31V's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

flavor: This S-31V's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

flavor: This S-31V's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

flavor: This S-32C's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

flavor: This S-32C's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-32C (Stealth)
flavor: This S-32C's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-32C (Void)
flavor: This S-32C's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-32C Phoenix
flavor: This variant of the coveted Phoenix has a powerful drive and agile thrusters.

name: S-32V
flavor: The Series-32V offers superb power and sterling maneuverability.

name: S-32V (Emerald)
flavor: This S-32V's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-32V (Plasma)
flavor: This S-32V's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-32V (Stealth)
flavor: This S-32V's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-32V (Void)
flavor: This S-32V's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-34 Ravensteel
flavor: The Sparrow is your pen, speed your ink, the open road your blank page. You are a poet of motion.

name: S-35 Aeon Glow
flavor: Turn on the lights.

name: SR-0 Swiftriver
flavor: Don't fight it. Flow with it.

name: SR-1 Swiftriver
flavor: Upgraded field engine makes the Swiftriver more nimble than ever.

name: SV7 "War Runner"
flavor: A high-end Sparrow earned by those Guardians who prove their worth in the Trials of Osiris.

name: Velumbra
flavor: "I face the challenges to come with dry eyes. There will be a time to mourn, but not until we have our vengeance." —Petra Venj

name: XV0 "Timebreaker"
flavor: Many are brave, but only the strong and the living will ever ride this Sparrow.

name: Arc Edge
flavor: The dark heart of Willbreaker burns within this blade.

name: Arc Infinite Edge
flavor: There are few companions truer than a well-honed weapon. Treasure it.

name: Bolt-Caster
flavor: With your own hands you forged the mighty Bolt-Caster. Now take it in hand and unleash its thunder.

name: Dark-Drinker
flavor: With your own hands you forged the mighty Dark-Drinker. Now take it in hand and slake its thirst.

name: Dreadfang
flavor: Kingly brother, I thank you for the gift of your failure. The sword logic demands a pinnacle.

name: Raze-Lighter
flavor: With your own hands you forged the mighty Raze-Lighter. Now take it in hand and feed its flames.

name: Sol Edge
flavor: This reforged shard of Willbreaker wavers on the edge of Light and Dark.

name: Sol Infinite Edge
flavor: Two blades are better than one.

name: Void Edge
flavor: The Hadium metal of what was once Willbreaker courses with conflicting energies.

name: Void Infinite Edge
flavor: As unbreakable as the bond between comrades in arms.

name: Khvostov 7G-0X
flavor: An ancient instrument of war, renewed and enhanced by Light, not unlike you.

name: GENESIS CHAIN~
flavor: SUROS ARI-41 ~insert(SIVA in THIS(current projectile))

name: Hex Caster ARC
flavor: The engine of devastation slumbers within - waiting for a worthy finger on the trigger.

name: The Unbent Tree
flavor: Forged in honor of Saladin, he who bore the Banner's legacy upon his shoulders.

name: Vision Stone
flavor: "Close your eyes, and open your mind." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Assembly II
flavor: Executor-issued auto rifle for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Extremophile 011
flavor: An auto rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: The Continental
flavor: This one's not from around here.

name: Zero-Day Dilemma
flavor: There's no defense against it.

name: Abyss Defiant (Adept)
flavor: Make the void roar.

name: Anguish of Drystan (Adept)
flavor: "Engines dead. Do we still have Earth signal? Tell them we were wrong!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

name: Atheon's Epilogue (Adept)
flavor: With time, every epilogue extends into a sequel.

name: ((GENESIS CHAIN~))
flavor: ~if(input(SIVA)) // echo Shirazi // output(death) // ask(not in vain)~

name: 77 Wizard
flavor: The Exo called Gaunt is a gunsmith famous for his Wizards.

name: ETHER NOVA~
flavor: Thesan FR4: Hasten the ~SIVA replication~

name: Saladin's Vigil

name: Days of Iron Gloves
flavor: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cobra's Vigil Gloves
flavor: "Step forward, if you think you can challenge me." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Ophidian Aspect
flavor: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

name: Temporis Floe IV
flavor: Consider the chronometer. It has no knowledge of past or future, only the infinite present.

name: Raku Izumi IV
flavor: Crucible variant. Element shift allows for optimal sprinting, jumping, and holding position.

name: High Command Steps
flavor: Rise above the noise. Take the throne.

name: Eon Tracer Legs
flavor: "I feel like every time I find the thread it slips through my fingers." —RECORD-448-CHASM-6565

name: Endling Steps
flavor: We are endangered, but we can save ourselves.

name: Red Miasma Boots
flavor: General, poorly worded or malicious code is the fault of the programmer, not SIVA itself. ~SIVA.MEM.WB010

name: Iron Saga Steps
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Hadron Gale IV
flavor: You might not see the storm with your eyes, but you will feel it.

name: Days of Iron Steps
flavor: "When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cobra's Vigil Steps
flavor: "The challenge will come when you least expect it. You must be ready." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Transversive Steps
flavor: In these boots, your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.

name: Endling Bond
flavor: "I am haunted by the Endling, the last living human." —Arach Jalaal

name: High Command Bond
flavor: "The City demands a leader. Now, before it is too late." —Executor Hideo

name: Eon Tracer Bond
flavor: "We trace the history of war throughout the ages." —Lakshmi-2

name: Sepiks Deposed Bond
flavor: "Prime no longer. No primes but we."

name: Red Miasma Bond
flavor: Just give it a directive, and it won't stop until it gets a new directive. ~SIVA.MEM.WB008

name: Iron Saga Bond
flavor: "The worlds still need the Iron Lords." —Lord Saladin

name: Idylls of the Iron Lords
flavor: "The tale of the Iron Lords is not over." —Lord Saladin Forge

name: Cobra's Vigil Bond
flavor: "We learn to live with this poison in our veins." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Bond of the Exile
flavor: "They who entered the Speaker's chambers as master and apprentice were bitter rivals when they left." —Brother Vance

name: Bond of Legends
flavor: The Warlock worthy of this bond has learned the secrets of every planet and heard the song of every star.

name: Robes of Triumph
flavor: Like a griffin's wings, the winds of victory carry you aloft.

name: Gloves of Triumph
flavor: At last, the answers lie before you. Reach out. Take them.

name: Hood of Triumph
flavor: This hood covers a mind that encompasses universes and the births and deaths of stars.

name: Steps of Triumph
flavor: You've walked all the ways of wisdom. The laurels of victory adorn your steps.

name: Oversoul's Pang
flavor: It writhes, shivers, and pulses with pain.

name: Continuum Pin
flavor: A fragment from a Vex portal that creates an eddy in the timestream.

name: Oraclery
flavor: A moving mechanical model whose parts blink in and out of existence.

name: Jasper Carcanet
flavor: I WAS MIDHA, CONSORT OF STARS. I WILL NOT BE FORGOTTEN.

name: Fist of Eight Moons
flavor: Only in the Ascendant Plane—where a well-defended idea is a reality—do these moons, in this small way, still exist.

name: Oversoul's Scream
flavor: If you hold it to your ear and listen closely, you'll go deaf.

name: Bretomart's Pledge
flavor: "I will not let you down. This is what I was reborn to do." —Lady Bretomart

name: Deidris's Fist
flavor: "I heard the Iron Lords' call. Here I am." —Lady Deidris

name: Colovance's Choice
flavor: "I will fight to stop the fighting. If that means I must die, then I choose death." —Lord Colovance

name: Perfected SIVA Shard
flavor: "It was inevitable Guardians would grab SIVA from off the field. Let's see what they do with it." —Shiro-4

name: SIVA Shard
flavor: This small fragment of SIVA tech hums with potential.

name: Perfected SIVA Core
flavor: "Be cautious with the SIVA you find. This all started because we unleashed what we shouldn't have." —Lord Saladin

name: SIVA Core
flavor: It's unclear what this SIVA generator powers, but its surface shivers with potential.

name: Perfected SIVA Capsule
flavor: "SIVA destroyed the Iron Lords, but history need not repeat itself. Use it if you must. Even the most destructive tool, in the end, is a tool." —Tyra Karn

name: SIVA Capsule
flavor: This bundle of SIVA rests safely in a containment capsule. For now.

name: Azure Lens
flavor:
"When I feel blue, this lens makes me happy. And when I feel happy, this lens makes me blue." —Wen Jie
This item is nonreturnable.

name: Golden Age Lens
flavor:
"Perhaps, in the past, Light had a warmer, redder hue? It's not impossible." —Wen Jie
This item is nonreturnable.

name: Grayscale Lens
flavor:
"A valuable reminder that nothing in the universe is black-and-white." —Wen Jie
This item is nonreturnable.

name: Oversoul's Gasp
flavor: The lingering echo of something that should have died long ago and far away.

name: Essence of the Oversoul
flavor: "Feed the Eidolon Ally, and it will be transformed." —Eris Morn
